description:
|  If you have a passion to write innovative, user-experience-oriented web
applications from scratch, using the latest state-of-the-art web development
technologies, you've come to the right place - Westernacher Solutions!  
  
At Westernacher Solutions you will participate in the architecture, design,
development and continuous integration of the front end of a RESTful oriented,
Java enterprise web application. You will use your solid skills as a software
developer of web applications to deliver high quality products to our
customers.You will work in an Agile environment, set up on SCRUM principles,
in small to medium-sized distributed teams of skilful software engineers. You
will be part of a stable German company with worldwide presence.  
  
Required skills:  
  
• Min. 2 years of experience in web development  
• Strong knowledge of single page web applications, web technologies and web
services  
• Strong experience with AngularJS  
• Strong experience with any JavaScript Libraries  
• Experience with using web services and Ajax calls  
• Experience with HTML 5/CSS3  
• Experience with version control systems  
• Experience with unit and integration testing  
• Fluent English, both oral and written  
• You like working in an agile way (Scrum, Kanban)  
• Open-minded team spirit, able to work in both small local and large
international teams  
• Delivering high-quality software to happy customers is your pride and joy  
  
It will be great (but not necessary) if you also have:  
  
• Experience with AngularJS 2, ExtJS or NodeJs  
• Experience with jQuery, Lodash or Underscore  
• Experience with RESTful Web Services  
• Experience with NoSQL, MongoDB  
• Experience with Bootsrap, Less or Sass  
• Experience with searching frameworks, such as ElasticSearch or Solr  
• Experience with testing frameworks, such as Karma or Jasmine  
• Experience with Git  
• Experience with npm  
  
Westernacher Solutions offers you:  
  
• A great team of talented colleagues  
• Small-to-medium-sized teams  
• Friendly working environment  
• Flexible working hours  
• An opportunity to work from home from time to time (home office)  
• Internal and external professional qualification trainings  
• Cosy atmosphere  
• An attractive remuneration package  
• Additional social benefits
title: Senior JavaScript Developer with Angular
Lead Front-End Developer
Technical Support fluent in English and Italian

description:
|  Максима България ЕООД е представител на литовската компания Maxima Grupe
UAB – най-големия инвеститор в Литва, Латвия и Естония. В нейните структури
работят над 25 000 служители. Компанията оперира на българския пазар, като
собственик на веригата магазини Т-Маркет и Т-Маркет Експрес, с 61 супермаркета
в цялата стрaна.  
  
Във връзка с разрастване на дейността, търсим:  
  
СИСТЕМЕН АДМИНИСТРАТОР в офис София  
  
ОТГОВОРНОСТИ:  
\- Инсталиране, конфигуриране и мониторинг на мрежовото оборудване и сървърни
системи.  
\- Консултиране и поддържане на външно интегрирани финансови системи.  
\- Осъщестявяване на системен анализ и инсталиране на критични и security
patches и update на Windows сървъри и приложения на работните станции.  
\- Конфигуриране и поддръжка на helpdesk системи и системи за наблюдение на
мрежовата производителност и свързаност.  
\- Управление на потребителите и правата на достъп до информационните системи.  
\- Техническа поддръжка на различните потребители на Максима България.  
  
ИЗИСКВАНИЯ:  
\- Висше образование – Компютърни системи и технологии, Информационни
технологии, Информатика или друго подходящо за длъжността.  
\- Опит – не по-малко от 2 години. Опит придобит в търговски или логистични
компании ще се приеме за предимство.  
\- Отлично познаване на Windows операционни системи, умения за интеграция и
експлоатация на сървърни и комуникационни системи.  
\- Добро познаване на Linux операционни системи.  
\- Отговорност и прецизност при отстраняване на възникнали проблеми.  
\- Умения за работа в екип.  
\- Добри познания по английски език.  
\- Шофьорска книжка.  
  
ПРЕДЛАГАМЕ:  
\- Конкурентно възнаграждение;  
\- Индивидуално кариерно развитие;  
\- Участие в иновативни софтуерни проекти;  
\- Участие в различни програми за обучение и тренинг програми;  
\- Осигурен транспорт до работното място.  
  
Ако предложението представлява интерес за Вас, моля кандидатствайте по тази
обява, като изпратите своята професионална автобиография.
title: Системен администратор

description:
|  PPD is a leading global contract research organization providing
comprehensive, integrated drug development, laboratory and lifecycle
management services. Our clients and partners include pharmaceutical,
biotechnology, medical device, academic and government organizations. With
offices in 46 countries and more than 15,000 professionals worldwide, PPD
applies innovative technologies, therapeutic expertise and a firm commitment
to quality to help clients and partners bend the cost and time curve of drug
development to deliver life-changing therapies that improve health.  
  
We have now an existing opportunity for a proven professional to join the
company as:  
  
Network Security Engineer  
  
The person entitled to this role provides technical security expertise as part
of a global team. The core function of the position is to develop and maintain
information technology security systems and to serve in meeting internal and
external client requirements, including protecting the confidentiality,
integrity and availability of company data.  
We are currently looking for a person with specific focus on security incident
management.  
  
Main Responsibilities:  
  
• Providing support for network and network security architecture, including
routers, switches, firewalls, proxies, VPNs, and load-balancers.  
• Working with other infrastructure, platform, and application team members to
understand and enforce access and data protection policies with Access Control
Lists (ACLs), firewall policies, IDS/IPS policies, change management of
policies and configurations.  
• Providing specific security expertise to engineering teams, include network
design, security testing, authentication methods, implementing encryption,
logging, and secure data transfer.  
• Undertaking routine preventative measures and implementing, maintaining and
monitoring network security  
• Setting up and maintaining enterprise wide security systems.  
• Creating and designs security infrastructure per PPD specifications.  
  
Education and Qualification requirements:  
  
Bachelor's degree in the relevant field  
2+ years’ in network security technology or IT security systems Certification
of Security+, CCNA Security, CCNP, CCNP Security, SSCP, OSCP, CEH will be
considered an advantage.  
  
Main requirements:  
  
Proven knowledge of network, operating systems, programming, cloud,
telecommunication or IT security technologies and platforms.  
Experience with security technologies such as F5, Cisco, Palo Alto, McAfee,
A10, and Juniper.  
Detailed technical knowledge of cyber forensic investigating techniques/tools.  
Understanding of security issues associated with operating systems,
networking, and virtualization software.  
Client focused approach with strong interpersonal skills.
title: Network Security Engineer

description:
|  THE EXPERIENCE MATTERS  
  
C3i Healthcare Connections, a division of Telerx, is an American company,
leading provider of technical support services for life sciences companies
worldwide. We operate in the field of Information technologies (IT) and their
application for the needs of the Pharmaceutical industry and clinical research
organizations. Since we had opened the office in Sofia, Bulgaria in 2005, we
managed to attract many talented and motivated people and helped them develop
their potential.  
  
To ensure the expansion of our Operations Center in Sofia, Bulgaria we are now
looking to recruit a Polish speaking CUSTOMER SUPPORT REPRESENTATIVES.  
  
The CUSTOMER SUPPORT REPRESENTATIVE is a direct link between the company and
the customers located around the globe, looking for service. The function of
the position is to help customers by providing information and guidance over
the phone and via email.  
  
Main responsibilities:  
• Provide comprehensive support to pharmaceutical companies and life-science
organizations personnel (doctors, nurses, patients, sales force, etc.) in
Polish and English.  
• Adhere to high company standards for quality, accuracy, thoroughness,
timeliness and consistency in customer care.  
  
Job requirements:  
• Fluency in both Polish and English  
• Excellent interpersonal and communications skills  
• Willingness to learn and obtain new skills and competencies  
• Ethics, Team work and Positive attitude  
• High school diploma  
• Knowledge of MS Office, Windows and Internet applications  
  
What we offer:  
• Opportunity to practice your foreign language skills  
• Professional on-boarding and on-going trainings  
• Real opportunities for career progression with leading US Company  
• Competitive salary and performance bonuses  
• Social benefits package  
• Possibility to combine work and study  
• Vibrant environment  
  
Are you willing to build up your career with us? - We’ll be happy to receive
your resume in English!  
  
*Your personal data is secure with us.  
** Only candidates selected for interview will be contacted

description:
|  АЙ ВИ БИ ЕООД, регистрирано при Министерство на труда и социалната политика
въз основа на чл. 28, ал. 5 от Закона за насърчаване на заетостта под № 2025
от 08.04.2016 г. да извършва посредническа дейност по наемане на работа за
Република България, с безсрочна регистрация търси за свой клиент – лидер на
пазара на офис оборудване – съгласно договор от 29.08.2016 г. високо мотивиран
професионалист за позицията  
  
СЕРВИЗЕН СПЕЦИАЛИСТ ЗА РЕГИОНА НА СОФИЯ  
  
Отговорности:  
• Осъществява следпродажбено обслужване, свързано с ремонт и профилактика на
продуктите на фирмата;  
• Инсталира и поддържа софтуерни продукти;  
• Участва в екипи за реализиране на проекти по оптимизиране на печат;  
• Постоянно повишава квалификацията си чрез покриване на задължителни курсове;  
• Дава консултации по телефон на клиентите на фирмата, свързани с технически
проблеми  
  
Изисквания:  
• Висше техническо образование  
• Познания в областта на електротехниката, електрониката и информационните
технологии  
• Свидетелство за управление на МПС, категория В – активен шофьор с възможност
да пътува в региона на София  
• Владеене на английски език писмено и говоримо  
  
Компетенции:  
• Аналитично мислене  
• Внимание към детайла  
• Отлични комуникативни умения  
• Умения за работа с клиенти  
• Лоялност, отговорност, инициативност  
  
Компанията предлага:  
• Трудов договор с 6 месеца изпитателен срок  
• Възможност за специализирани професионални обучения и реализация в утвърдена
компания  
• Мотивиращо заплащане на база постигнати резултати  
  
Ако проявявате интерес, моля да ни изпратите CV.  
Всички кандидатури ще бъдат разгледани при стриктна конфиденциалност и при
спазване на изискванията на Закона за защита на личните данни.  
Само предварително одобрените по документи кандидати ще бъдат поканени на
интервю.
title: СЕРВИЗЕН СПЕЦИАЛИСТ

company: Hewlett Packard Enterprise / Hewlett-Packard GDBC EOOD
description:
|  The Global Engineering and Technical Consulting team is responsible for
architecture and engineering and integration of DCS & Cloud solutions
based on the standards or nonstandard portfolio offerings. Often our services
are utilized during the transformation phase to help a client move from
“current state” to “future state”. We enable accounts and delivery teams to
provide DCS and Cloud Services that were contracted with the client.  
  
  
Description:  
  
• Responsible for implementing part or all of the technical solution to the
client, in accordance with an agreed technical design. Occasionally
responsible for providing a detailed technical design for enterprise
solutions. Understands a broad spectrum of HP technology in order to provide
part or all of a detailed technical design which meets customer requirements.  
• Often leads small to medium technical projects. Works with and under the
direction of the Project/Technical Manager and with customer nominated
representatives. Liaises with Solutions Architect as appropriate.  
• Provides technical support and input on the application of technology to a
defined business segment. Provides advice on solution and integration
opportunities to defined segments.  
• Provides technical leadership on specific integration activities that are
part of an engagement.  
• Provides planning and design support for the development of solution
architectures that will be implemented in a multiple system environment.  
• Communicates across client community, and is viewed as adding value.
Demonstrates execution of the HP strategy.  
• Contributes to knowledge tools and communities, and ensures project
learning’s are documented and shared. Role models Focuses on single customer.
Solves diverse and complex. May lead a project team.  
  
  
Education and Experience:  
  
5+ years of professional experience and a Bachelor of Arts/Science or
equivalent degree in computer science or related area of study; without a
degree, three additional years of relevant professional experience (8+ years
in total).  
  
Knowledge and Skills Required:  
• Has sufficient depth and breadth of technical knowledge to be individually
responsible for the design and scope of deliverables within a field of
expertise. Has led small team in delivery of a specific deliverable.  
• Has mastered at least one technical discipline with strong knowledge in at
least three major technology areas. Possesses advanced level of business,
technical, or functional knowledge.  
• Has ability to perform/drive resolution of problems on combinations and
interactions of products. Ability to apply technology and consulting to solve
a client business problem.  
• Able to communicate and present complex issues with assurance and
confidence. Demonstrates the use of consulting skills including: questioning,
listening, ideas development, permission and rapport, and influencing.  
• Ability to conduct/lead oral status/technical interchange meetings with
clients on small to medium sized engagements.  
• Owns and produces customer documentation. Ability to translate technical
details into concise and easy to understand written form. Ability to write
relevant components of a proposal document (e.g. answer specific RFP
questions). Ability to translate verbal requirements from face to face client
meetings into requirements documents, statements of work, and proposals.  
• Able to discuss (within own area of expertise) requirements with a customer,
and to challenge and clarify when appropriate. From the requirements, able to
develop a high level design or plan, and then estimate the amount of effort
required to deliver. Able to advise the engagement owner about the risks
associated with this work package.  
• Ability to work with a team to provide written responses to technical
proposals and /or reports/documentation for delivery  
  
Microsoft SQL Server Skills:  
• Microsoft SQL Server 2005, 2008, 2012 with proven experience on standalone,
cluster and geo-cluster configuration  
o SQL Server High Availability features (Always On, Mirroring, Replication,
Log Shipping)  
• Microsoft Windows Server 2008/2012  
• [welcome but not mandatory] Microsoft MCSx certification  
• Experienced in design and deploy SQL server  
  
We offer a challenging role including:  
• Continuous learning and technical training opportunities  
• Great opportunity for professional development in the IT field  
• Part in a team that has established itself as a preferred partner for Hi-
tech Services & Support throughout EMEA  
• Competitive remuneration package  
• Medical insurance  
• 4 days additional paid leave (total:24 days)  
• Food vouchers  
• Opportunity to use free bus / parking  
• Life insurance  
• Wellness program  
• HPE badge program including various discounts for products and services  
• Work-life balance program including free legal, financial and psychological
consultations  
  
Thank you for taking the time to review our job, if you think it is a match to
your experience and interests please apply today with a CV in English— we are
eager to learn more about you! Only short-listed candidates will be contacted.  
  
  
This is to inform you that Hewlett Packard Enterprise GDBC EOOD (HPE) is

company: Hewlett Packard Enterprise / Hewlett-Packard GDBC EOOD
description:
|  Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) creates new possibilities for technology
to have a meaningful impact on people, businesses, governments and society.
HPE invents, engineers, and delivers technology solutions that drive business
value, create social value, and improve the lives of our clients. The largest
line of business - Enterprise Services produces better business outcomes for
our clients through our comprehensive Infrastructure Technology Outsourcing
Services. Our service excellence, with consistent globally delivered
standardized services guarantees clients peace of mind, while our ability to
drive innovation ensures clients a compelling strategy for the future.

The Technical Escalation Orange Account Manager is the key to a successful
escalation solution. This individual brings together all the elements needed
to ensure the escalation or issue at hand is resolved in a manner which is
both efficient and concludes in an outcome which suits the business needs of
the customer and HPE. He/She is responsible for the overall management of a
technical escalation and owns the overall action plan, management level
communication and drives decision making processes both internally and
externally.

The Technical Escalation Orange Account Manager is a part of a highly valued
team that coordinates technical resources across multiple departments and
ensures customer success by communicating professionally and in a timely
manner during the process of leading Technical Escalations/Outages. In the
most critical situation for a customer the Escalation Manager, backed by all
TS Global Support Delivery Teams, will enable HPE to make the difference in
providing support to our customers.

The holder of this position will be part of the Technical Escalation/Outage
Management Team, reporting to the Senior Manager - Technical
Escalations/Outage Management.

**Other key deliverables include: **

  * Act as the focal point for Technical Escalations/Outages liaising between the customer and the internal stake holders.
  * Act as the customer advocate and liaison to drive customer satisfaction.
  * Create a plan of action for each issue by aligning technical resources including Escalation Specialist, Level 2 Teams, Field Technical support representatives and Engineering to drive timely resolution of Escalations/Outages.
  * Proactively engage with internal stake holders to help HPE meet SLAs, organizational goals and metrics.
  * Communicate and effectively manage the customer's expectations at all levels of their organization.
  * Create strong synergies within the internal teams, along with being an active participant in the GEM community.
  * Ensure highest levels of customer satisfaction by proactively delivering information about Outages at a frequency that matches the situation's urgency.

** **

**Professional qualification requirements: **

  * 5 years’ experience in project/escalation management or in similar roles/businesses;
  * Experience in working with technology business, preferably storage, servers, and networking;
  * 3 + years’ experience in handling high level escalations for huge organizations or similar demonstrated experience;
  * Bachelor's (undergraduate) degree or Master's (graduate)degree in technical/scientific discipline or equivalent on the job experience;
  * Knowledge management skills: creation and re-use of intellectual capital;
  * Excellent communication and leadership skills;
  * Excellent project management and organizational skills;
  * Team player: ability and willingness to motivate and support other engineers;
  * Should be flexible to work in the nights or any flexible hours as per the business requirement as the technical escalation manager needs to manage outages/escalations for a 24*7 functioning organization.

**Core**:

  * Good understanding of service management principles, excellent understanding of Incident Management and Problem Management (ITIL certification a plus);
  * Good understanding of project management (PM) techniques and tools (PMP certification a plus);
  * Excellent verbal and written communication skills;
  * Sound negotiating and excellent presentation skills;
  * Fluent in English;
  * Ability to summarize Technical content for non-Technical executive audience.

**  
We offer:**

  * Great opportunity for professional development in the IT field and continuous learning opportunities;
  * Competitive remuneration package;
  * Medical insurance;
  * 4 days additional paid leave (total: 24 days);
  * Food vouchers;
  * Life insurance;
  * Wellness program;
  * HPЕ badge program including various discounts for products and services;
  * Work-life balance program including free legal, financial and psychological consultations.

Thanks for taking the time to review our job, if you think it is a match to
your experience and interests please apply today— we are eager to learn more
about you! If you know a friend who may be a fit for the job please refer
them.

company: Hewlett Packard Enterprise / Hewlett-Packard GDBC EOOD
description:
|  
Hewlett Packard Enterprise is an industry leading technology company that
enables customers to go further, faster. With the industry’s most
comprehensive portfolio, spanning the cloud to the data center to workplace
applications, our technology and services help customers around the world make
IT more efficient, more productive and more secure.  
  
The Capacity Specialist is responsible for applying detailed technical
capacity planning knowledge to the process. The Planner collates information
for all new or changed infrastructure, defines and requests expansion
requirements, estimates overall growth or reduction of user demand and
anticipates the effect of improvements in technology on overall component
demand. The candidate should possess a solid understanding of their technology
and be capable of making sound, informed judgements in a timely and accurate
manner. The Capacity Specialist would be working in a global environment
providing technical inputs that inform the optimum spend of an annual budget
in excess of $10m.  
  
The Capacity Planner is responsible for applying detailed technical Capacity
Planning knowledge to the process. This is a dynamic position, supporting the
Capacity Management team in a highly visible positon. This position will
functionally report to the Global Client Capability lead. The Planner
accumulates information for all new or changed infrastructures and defines
expansion requirements. Estimating overall growth or decrease of user demand
and anticipated improvements in technology on overall component demand is a
key responsibility for this role.  
  
  
Job specifics/responsibilities:  
  
  
• Produce capacity plans in line with business planning cycles; identifying
requirements early enough to accommodate procurement and approval lead times.  
• Document need for increases and reductions in hardware based on service
level requirements, targets and cost constraints.  
• Provide regular management reports which include current usage of resources,
trends and forecasts  
• Provide holistic management of capacity that includes people and processes
as well as technology  
• Oversee decisions and actions to utilize Demand Management for controlling
capacity when necessary  
• Ensure shortfalls in capacity are recognized and appropriate corrective
actions are identified and progressed on a timely basis  
• Create and maintain forward looking capacity forecasts to predict future
hardware/software spend  
• Provide regular reports on capacity to direct line management  
• Organize and maintain a regular capacity review process  
• Agree appropriate actions to maintain or improve capacity levels  
• Initiate and coordinate actions required to maintain or improve capacity
across appropriate IT units  
• Act as a coordination point for changes to capacity levels when needed  
  
  
  
Qualifications

title: Senior .NET Developers

description:
|

**OVERVIEW**  
  
**Zertios LTD:**

Our startup was founded in 2014 managing the website migrations of a family of
web hosting companies in Belgium. Since then we have gradually expanded our
expertise. Currently Zertios is working as a micro-scale service centre for
tens of thousands of customers with more than 100 000 websites, providing
solutions for system monitoring, support, web development, digital marketing
and looking to add more…  
  
**The job:**  
We are expanding our Sofia team with two Web Migration Engineers that are
capable of handling complex semi-automated migrations of hundreds of websites
between hosting environments.

The team you will be a part of will evolve in time, going through three
distinct stages.

  * **In stage I **your primary focus is to integrate/migrate applications (websites) onto the company hosting cluster, resolving all issues stemming from differences between the environments.
  * **In stage II **you are responsible for developing new methods to migrate content minimizing the issues known from stage I. This will include writing scripts and developing tools that facilitate the process.
  * **In stage III**, you become a fully-functional part of a creative technical team that is responsible for all aspects of the technical hosting infrastructure within the company.

**The training:  
**We expect the applicants to have solid technical background we can step on. Zertios will offer you paid subject-specific training in our Sofia office for between 2 and 3 weeks.

Learning at Zertios is a continuous process. After you step into the position
you can expect to be encouraged and supported by the company to develop and
expand your knowledge through various channels.  
  
**The office:**  
After the end of the training the engineers will start work in the office, in
the very center of Sofia. Refreshments are on us!  
  
**REQUIRED SKILLS**

**IT skills:**

  * Profound understanding of the Linux Operating System.
  * Junior software development experience in PHP.
  * Understanding of open source projects like Joomla, Drupal, Magento, Wikis, OsCommerce, etc.
  * Demonstrable knowledge of web technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AJAX, etc.
  * Experience with relational databases like MySQL.
  * Be able to deploy code trough different protocols like SSH, FTP, GIT, etc.
  * Understanding of common internet protocols including DNS, IMAP, POP3, SMTP, HTTP.
  * Define and keep your deadlines

**Language skills:**

  * Very good verbal communication in English is a must.

**Personal skills:**

  * Reliable and loyal
  * Responsible
  * Flexible
  * Independent 
  * Self-improvement
  * Excellent communication skills
  * Efficient communication with different remote technical teams

**WHAT YOU WILL DO**

  * Website migrations
  * Database migrations
  * Server migrations
  * PHP scripts for automated migrations (from stage II on)
  * Development and maintenance of the hosting infrastructure (from stage III on)

**WHEN YOU WILL WORK**

The system engineers will have flexible working hours and should be willing to
take about 1 week per month of night work.

**WHAT WE DO FOR YOU**

  * Paid training
  * Competitive salary
  * Cool office location in the very center of Sofia
  * Free energy boost – tea, coffee, fresh fruit
  * Social benefits
  * Career future

_If you think you fit the profile, please do not hesitate to apply. We will be
glad to meet you in person!_

**  
We are an international software company focused on mobile security, privacy

Phone and Secure Pack, as well as Secure BlackBerry.  
  
**Secure Group**, formerly DELATEK, is an international provider of solutions for secure mobile communications. As the name implies, we enable our customers to exchange sensitive information safely, protecting their business and personal life.  
  
We have built a name for our secure and user-friendly Secure Phone and Secure

description:
|

**OVERVIEW**  
  
**Zertios LTD:  
**Our startup was founded in 2014 managing the website migrations of a family of web hosting companies in Belgium. Since then we have gradually expanded our expertise. Currently Zertios is working as a micro-scale service centre for tens of thousands of customers with more than 100 000 websites, providing solutions for system monitoring, support, web development, digital marketing and looking to add more… 

**The job:**  
As a Web Developer/Graphic designer you will be involved in the design of
different visuals for our customer’s corporate website and its brands. You
will be working in the web development team managing a portfolio of different
hosting brands with multiple transactions every month. You will help improve
and maintain the online image and marketability of the company and its
products with various smart design solutions – while keeping in line with its
current vision.

You will work independently as a distant team member, but you will be strongly
engaged in internal projects (various websites, promos, temporary campaign
sites, ...) You will be involved from the briefing until the final result.

You get the opportunity to put forward your ideas and go through with them
from the concept to the realization. We offer you the necessary space for
participation, organization and involvement.  
  
**The training:**  
The training starts as soon as you sign your labor contract, which means you
are already on the company payroll. We expect the applicants to have design
background and some experience with web design projects. Zertios will then
offer you subject-specific training by our experienced team leads to further
your web development skills in our Sofia office for between 2 and 3 weeks.

Learning at Zertios is a continuous process. After you step into the position
you can expect to be encouraged and supported by the company to develop and
expand your knowledge through various channels.  
  
**The office:**  
After the end of the training the graphic designers will continue work from
our Sofia office, as a distant team member to the Belgian team. Location is in
the perfect centre. Refreshments are on us.  
  
**REQUIRED SKILLS**

**Design skills:**

  * You have a webdesign background and can prove it with a beautiful portfolio
  * You are mainly interested to further develop your career in front-end development.
  * Excellent command of Adobe products: 
    * Photoshop
    * Illustrator
    * InDesign

**Web design skills:**

  * Good knowledge of HTML, CSS is a must
  * Knowledge of Bootstrap is a must
  * Knowledge of jQuery is a must
  * Basic knowledge of Symfony is a plus
  * Basic knowledge of Linux commands is a plus
  * Basic knowledge of Composer is a plus
  * Basic knowledge of Grunt is a plus
  * Basic knowledge of Bower is a plus
  * Basic awareness of online marketing and SEO is a plus

**Language skills:**

  * Excellent verbal skills in English are a must

**Personal skills:**

  * Reliable and loyal
  * Responsible
  * Flexible
  * Independent 
  * Self-improvement
  * Excellent communication skills
  * Efficient communication with different remote technical teams

**WHAT YOU WILL DO**

  * Your first task will be to get familiar with look and feel of the brands you will manage.
  * Designing and maintaining projects on our customer’s corporate website and its various brands
  * Create designs of pages with the look and feel of the Brand
  * Code the designs online
  * Improve existing pages to be more in line with brand design
  * Banners and images for commercial campaigns
  * E-book/Whitepaper design

**WHAT TO EXPECT **

  * On our 1st interview we will talk about your experience. We will assess your skills in English. We will discuss your portfolio.
  * On our 2nd interview we do a test to examine your skills.
  * On our 3rd interview you will get to meet the client you will be working for.

**WHAT WE DO FOR YOU**

  * Paid training
  * Cool office location in the very center of Sofia
  * Free energy boost – tea, coffee, fresh fruit
  * Competitive salary
  * Social benefits
  * Career future

_  
ALL APPLICANTS MUST SUBMIT A URL TO AN ONLINE PORTFOLIO _

___If you think you fit the profile, please do not hesitate to apply. We will
be glad to meet you in person!_

description:
|  A small but busy and creative web agency with a diverse portfolio spanning
hybrid app development, custom integrated software solutions and website
development for clients based in the EU and US is looking for an experienced /
senior developer with a strong work ethos, team-player attitude and a good

The new team member will feel comfortable blending into a small set-up with an
established flow of task and project management, code and peer reviews,

This is a great opportunity for an outgoing and confident individual to assume

The ideal candidate has strong experience in PHP, MySql, JavaScript, HTML,
XHTML and CSS and is able to learn quickly and master diverse technologies and
development techniques. Attention to detail and drive for perfection go
without saying.  
  
Required Skills  
  
• 2+ years of verifiable experience in developing and architecting Web
Solutions. Profound knowledge of PHP/Python, MySql, Javascript , HTML/CSS and
version control systems is a must.

PHP)  
• Able to work independently as well as in a team;

Experience with one or more of the following a huge advantage:

To apply

Interested? You’re most welcome to apply. Please send a CV and a short, but

title: Experienced PHP Developer

description:
|  В SkadIT разработваме уеб и cloud-базирани софтуерни решения и интегрирани
системи, Drupal уебсайтове и хибридни приложения. Разширяваме дейността си и
ни е нужен Open Source програмист, който да подсили екипа. Нашата мисия е да
доставяме професионални услуги и качествени решения на своите клиенти, сред
които има водещи глобални брандове. Вижте повече за нас и нашите клиенти на
сайта ни.  
  
Инвестираме в екип от добри специалисти, които имат свободата да прилагат
знанията си, да бъдат креативни и да развиват себе си и продуктите на
компанията – и да бъдат подобаващо възнаградени за това.  
  
Познаваме и прилагаме най-добрите практики в управлението на проекти и
вярваме, че процесите ни за разработка и комуникация, и системите ни за
разпределение на задачите и контрол на качеството, създават сигурна и приятна
среда за развитието на всеки, който би се определил като отборен играч.
Успешният кандидат има визия и желание да допринася за постоянното развитие на
работния процес, и искрен стремеж нещата да бъдат създавани правилно от самото
начало.  
  
Изисквания:  
  
\- 2+ години опит в работа и проектиране на Open Source Web applications:
PHP/Python, MySql, Javascript , HTML/CSS и опит с version control systems.  
\- Познания по администриране и работа с LAMP пакета (Linux / Apache / MySql /
PHP).  
\- Разбиране на основите в разработката на уеб приложения.  
\- работен английски.  
  
Предимства:  
\- Искрен интерес, мотивация и желание за работа в силен екип за разработка на
качествени Open Source приложения.  
\- Интерес и мотивация да се включва активно в планирането и изпълнението на
поставените задачи, за да може тимът му да се развива и постига целите си.  
\- Проактивност по отношение на възникналите проблеми и способност да намира
решения на базата на собствения си опит и разбиране за правилен процес.  
\- Доказан опит и познания за добрите практики в agile development, code and
peer reviews, Gitflow и deployment process.  
\- Опит в поне едно от следните е огромно предимство:  
• Hybrid app development  
• Sencha Touch  
• Ionic SDK  
• Python  
• Drupal  
  
Ние предлагаме:  
  
\- Възможност за реализиране на идеите на кандидата за изграждане на екип и
процес. Свобода да прилагате знанията си и принос, който ще бъде оценен.  
\- Работа с доказани специалисти в областта на Open Source приложенията,
предлагаща широко поле за собствено развитие и усъвършенстване  
\- Безценен опит в разработката на уеб приложения и възможност да сте част от
процеса и дългосрочните планове за развитие на амбициозна IT компания.

description:
|  As market leader in enterprise application software, SAP helps companies of
all sizes and industries innovate through simplification. From the back office
to the boardroom, warehouse to storefront, on premise to cloud, desktop to
mobile device – SAP empowers people and organizations to work together more
efficiently and use business insight more effectively to stay ahead of the
competition. SAP applications and services enable customers to operate
profitably, adapt continuously, and grow sustainably.  
  
PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES  
  
SAP HANA is a revolutionary market-leading in-memory database and application
platform. It utilizes cutting-edge in-memory computing technologies made
possible through recent advances in main memory, multi-core processing and
data management. SAP HANA leverages technology innovation to enable real-time
analysis of Big Data. Optimized for both transactional and analytical
processing, SAP HANA brings a dramatic increase in performance of
applications.  
  
Being much beyond a next-generation database, SAP HANA also enables end-to-end
application development via its Extended Application Services – so you can
build web-based applications that communicate with SAP HANA. The platform
provides standard Java and  
  
Node.js application runtimes, and is built substantially on open-source
projects.  
  
We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join us in inventing and
delivering a state-of-the-art Continuos Delivery Infrastructure and Framework
for SAP HANA XS that will guarantee quality without compromises for both cloud
and on-premise app developers.  
  
  
EXPECTATIONS AND TASKS  
  
You will be working in a cross-functional team, following agile methodologies
and industry best practices. As part of the team you will:  
  
Design, develop and deliver new software with clean code. This includes
defining and reviewing architecture, prototyping, creating automated tests and
technical documentation  
Perform code reviews and have your code reviewed by other team members  
Cooperate tightly with other development groups from different locations  
Do functional, performance and scalability testing, analyze results and drive
optimizations with affected teams  
Help porting applications which run on standalone Tomcat,TomEE or Node.js to a
microservices runtime based on Cloud Foundry.  
Constantly acquire new knowledge and skills and put them into practice  
  
  
WHAT WE OFFER  
  
A unique opportunity to become part of the #1 enterprise software vendor  
Broad expertise and cutting-edge product knowledge  
Professional working environment in a team of highly motivated experts  
Wide exposure to international projects  
Competitive benefits package  
  
EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS / SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES  
  
Proactive problem-solving attitude  
Excellent programming skills in Java  
Excellent understanding of OOP, data structures, algorithms and design
patterns  
Strong communication and negotiation skills  
Fluency in English  
Highly dependable, self-reliant and teamwork-oriented individual  
Willingness to learn new technologies  
  
  
EXPERIENCE WITH ANY OF THE FOLLOWING IS AN ADVANTAGE  
  
Strong knowledge of Java and Java EE internals including class loading, memory
management, and transaction management  
Web and application servers (Tomcat, TomEE, SAP WebAS Java, JBoss, Glassfish,
Node.js etc.)  
Web development (HTTP protocol, HTML5, JavaScript, Struts, Spring,
JSP/Servlets/JSTL etc.)  
Cloud Foundry, Docker  
RDBMS and JDBC  
Versioning and revision control systems (git, github, perforce)  
Continuous Integration (Maven, JUnit, Ant, Jenkins)  
Design and analysis of N-tiered applications, with multi-tier architecture and
production Internet architectures.  
Operating Systems (Linux, Windows, OS X)  
Virtualization infrastructure  
Scripting languages (Ruby, Perl, Shell scripting)  
HANA  
  
  
SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT  
  
To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its
diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the
unique competencies that each person brings to the company.  
  
  
SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to
providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental
disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and
are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or
to complete your application, please send online your request to Recruiting
Operations team. Requests for reasonable accommodation will be considered on a
case-by-case basis.
title: (Senior) Developer XS Integration Team Job

description:

technology are transforming industries, society, and even the workplace—by

IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal

**Sensata Technologies** (NYSE: ST) is one of the world's leading suppliers of sensing, electrical protection, control and power management solutions. We design and manufacture devices that help satisfy the world’s growing need for safety, energy efficiency and a clean environment in global automotive, appliance, aircraft, industrial, military, heavy vehicle, heating, air-conditioning and ventilation, data, telecommunications, recreational vehicle and marine markets.

We are a rapidly growing $2.4 billion business with operations and business
centers in 16 countries and over 17,000 employees worldwide, including 900

at our U.S. headquarters in Attleboro, MA.

We pride ourselves on being a leading global company with strong, local

description:
|  **DESCRIPTION  
**  
We are an international software company focused on mobile security, privacy
and end-to-end encryption. Our flagship products are the Android-based Secure
Phone and Secure Pack, as well as Secure BlackBerry.  
  
**Secure Group**, formerly DELATEK, is an international provider of solutions for secure mobile communications. As the name implies, we enable our customers to exchange sensitive information safely, protecting their business and personal life.  
  
We have built a name for our secure and user-friendly Secure Phone and Secure
BlackBerry smartphones, as well as Secure Pack — our suite of mobile
communication apps. Our products employ the best end-to-end encryption
technologies available.  
  
**OUR MISSION**  
  
Our ultimate mission is to ensure our customers’ cybersecurity and enable them
to communicate in full privacy without compromising neither protection, nor
user-friendliness.  
  
**OUR VISION**  
  
No great goal could ever be achieved without a great vision. To accomplish our
mission, we have committed to providing the best encrypted communication
products, services and solutions, and to educating people.  
  
**We're now hiring a Project Manager at our main R&D center, located in Sofia, Bulgaria.**  

**RESPONSIBILITIES**

  * Work closely with software engineers, QA, Product Managers and Usability to get high-quality product and features through the software project lifecycle (build, test and release on time).

  * Ensure your projects consistently meet standards and policies (agile, security, usability, etc.)

  * Take responsibility for release schedules and milestones, identify possible issues & risks and clearly communicate them to project stakeholders.

  * Work closely with product management on elicitating product and business requirements

  * Responsible for delivering new features and maintenance of released versions

  * Periodic performance review of engineers

**REQUIREMENTS**

  * BA/BS degree or equivalent practical experience.
  * 3+ years of experience in software focused project management or technical lead
  * Experience with agile development methodologies (e.g. SCRUM, Kanban etc.)
  * Experience working with engineering and product management

_**It would be a huge plus** if you have:_

  * 5+ years of experience in software-focused project management
  * Scrum or Agile certification
  * Knowledge in software product management lifecycle
  * High-level understanding of technical architectures to determine project impacts
  * Experience with mobile apps
  * Excellent judgment, decision making skills, and the ability to work under pressure

**BENEFITS**

  * Competitive** remuneration**
  * Excellent** working environment**
  * Spacious office space with **entertainment** and **relaxation** areas
  * We invest in your education - company paid **training courses**
  * Extra** day off **for each year you work at the company
  * Company-sponsored **SportPass** cards for various sports activities
  * Private **health insurance**
  * Free **parking**
  * **Relocation** assistance
  * And more...

_If you think we are a good match, send us your **CV in English** now!_

description:
|  Opencode Systems is a telecommunications solution provider, dedicated to
open systems for All-G and Telco-over-Cloud mobile networks. Our specialized
core network technology is invisible to consumers but underlies many of the
mobile services they use.  
Opencode real-time core network products include Multi-Channel Network Browser
& Studio, iSDP (IMS Service Delivery Platform), Network Services Broker,
Core Messaging Suite, Carrier App Browser and other first-to-market
specialized solutions. Over 60 active mobile operators in more than 40
countries worldwide rely 24/7 on Opencode core network platforms. Opencode
patented, game-changing, network- and cloud-driven virtualized technology is
the preferred choice for the open and creative mobile network.  
  
Due to expanding its activities the company is looking for highly motivated
energetic person for the position of Linux System Administrator / Telecom
solutions integration and maintenance engineer  
  
Your Role:  
• System and Services Integration  
• Project Engineering  
• Technical Maintenance and Support  
• Linux System Administration  
• Client Correspondence  
• International Travel  
  
Requirements:  
• Excellent English verbal skills  
• Excellent customer service skills, both verbal and written;  
• Experience with networking and LAN technology;  
• Very good knowledge in Linux System Administration;  
• Good DB and SQL background, MySQL administration and maintenance;  
• Experience for compiling/installing/configuring software products for common
Linux distributions such as Redhat or Fedora  
• Intuition

description:
|  SolarEdge invented an intelligent inverter solution that revolutionized the
way power is harvested and managed in a solar photovoltaic (PV) system. The
SolarEdge direct current (DC) optimized inverter system maximizes power
generation at the individual PV module level while lowering the cost of energy
produced by the solar PV system. Since beginning commercial shipments in 2010,
SolarEdge has shipped approximately 3.4 Gigawatt (GW) of its DC optimized
inverter systems and products have been installed in solar PV systems in more
than 96 countries. SolarEdge’s mission is to become the leading provider of
inverter solutions across all solar PV market segments and broaden the
availability of clean, renewable solar energy.  
  
**Job Description:**  
In this role you will specify, design, and implement automation tests for
features and product fixes that involve Java back end, front end and database,
using various technologies. You shall evaluate, analyse automation
infrastructure, identify problems, and develop solutions. If you have a
passion for QA automation world, a deep understanding of the web world, an
ability to deliver highly tested product guaranteeing 100% user satisfaction,
we want to meet you.  
  
We offer a pleasant working environment, great technological challenges and a
great team spirit. We are looking for talented QA engineers that are seeking
for challenging tasks and eager to learn and master new technologies.

**Personal skills:**

• Highly motivated

title: Senior C# Software Engineer

description:
|

**As an IT Analyst**, located in Sofia, you will be responsible for providing technical support for BISAM’s B-One product - a market-leading performance and attribution software solution.

B-One is trusted by 10 of the top 50 global asset managers whose combined
Assets under Management exceed 10 trillion USD with global operations across
North America, EMEA and APAC.

These global asset managers rely on B-One on a daily basis for:

  * the official results that are provided to their clients/funds
  * the performance analytics explaining their investment processes that are used by portfolio managers, relationship managers, sales & marketing and client reporting teams.

You will work as the first point of contact for all customer queries regarding
the product functionality as well as any issues raised by Professional
Services team during B-One implementations and other customer projects. This
role is integral to building strong customer relations and the individual
needs to be a strong communicator and customer focused to succeed in the role.

The customer experience team works closely with a number of internal teams to
resolve customer queries. The individual will need to manage and maintain
communications across all of these teams including Product Support, Architects
and Research & Development in tracking bugs, to ensure timely responses
and resolutions as well as the Account Management team in case a customer
raises an Enhancement request or requires Professional Services’ assistance.

** **

**Responsibilities:**

Reporting to the Head of Customer Support, you will assist the support team on
the following tasks:

  * Contribute to the on-going support of clients by analyzing and solving complex technical, application or database issues
  * Responsible for the management of support tickets ensuring timely responses are sent in accordance to the Service Level Agreements
  * Investigate and troubleshoot tickets raised by customers qualifying any potential software defects
  * Support the defect resolution process by providing clear descriptions of defects and validating the resulting fixes
  * Identify errors and mistakes in BISAM’s software and documentation and suggest corrections and improvements
  * Logging and assisting in debugging identified defects, working with other teams within BISAM, ensuring all information required is captured and transferred
  * Active participation in enriching the Knowledge Base
  * Engage proactively with customers regarding their tickets, providing regular and clear updates
  * Maintain a professional and courteous manner with customers and colleagues alike
  * Build strong relationships with all areas of the BISAM business so as to ensure delivery of a world class service to the customers
  * Managing customer expectations and relationships to the highest level
  * Support your colleagues as required in the resolution of customer enquiries
  * Continually seek to develop your knowledge of the B-One solution, both technical and functional

** **

**Desired Qualifications, Skills & Experience:**

  * Strong Bachelor or Master Degree in Computer Science, IT, Finance or Mathematics
  * Highly proficient in spoken and written English
  * SQL query tuning and troubleshooting
  * Oracle 11G/12C administration and troubleshooting
  * SQL Server knowledge
  * Java application servers, especially Tomcat
  * Java application tuning, instrumentation, troubleshooting
  * Linux and Windows system administration and shell scripting
  * Message queues: JMS, ActiveMQ, RabbitMQ
  * Web services (SOAP/WSDL)
  * Strong analytical thinking and problem solving skills
  * Strong math skills
  * Highly pro-active approach
  * Analytical thinker
  * Strong team player
  * Service minded attitude
  * Very enthusiastic and motivated

  * Speaking French is a big plus as some of our clients are French
  * Knowledge of the asset management industry is a plus
  * Experience with performance measurement or attribution is a plus
  * Knowledge of financial reporting and BIRT specifically is a plus
  * Experience with customer support is a plus

**Location:**

  * Sofia (training is done in Paris and London)

If you enjoy a fast paced work environment with opportunities for growth,
development and success, then please send your resume and cover letter in
English to be considered for this position.

BISAM recruits talented individuals around the world and offers a wide variety
of benefits including:

  * Very competitive salary
  * Annual bonus opportunity
  * Internal and external training opportunities
  * Career development opportunities across our various teams and offices in Europe and North America (Paris, London, NY, Boston, LA).

description:
|  IBM Technical Support Services’ (TSS) mission is to become the largest and
most successful provider of technical support services in the world. The
Client Innovation Center in Sofia, Bulgaria is building a trans-disciplinary
team of network support specialists tasked with supporting our clients in any
country worldwide.  
The Network Support Specialist – Tier 4 is a Customer Support Engineer role
that is a member of a technical team who’s responsible for owning and
resolving support requests raised by customers.  
  
**_ Responsibilities:_  
**   

  * IBM Linux support works with IBM’s largest clients providing technical assistance, diagnosing Linux defects and advising clients on upgrades. In addition these individuals will have “premium” role, supporting IBM’s clients that have signed up for our highest levels of support. In this role the individual will have account management responsibilities for clients that are assigned to them.

  * IBM Linux support is responsible for three distributions, Red Hat, SUSE and Ubuntu and three platforms, x86, Power and System z. As a result the environment is very dynamic, exposing the team to a broad range of technologies and endless learning opportunities.

  * The IBM Linux Support team is a highly collaborative group and the team members are each given the opportunity to establish themselves as a subject matter expert in their areas of interest. The team is not your typical support organization, the team members are highly skilled, they thrive in an environment that brings new challenges daily, fostering a culture of learning and they are driven in their efforts to help IBM’s client succeed.

  * IBM uses a follow-the-sun model coupled with an on-call rotation to ensure we can successfully provide 24x7 coverage. All team members are required to take part in the rotation.

  

_**Required Technical and Professional Expertise:**_

  * English fluent (both written and verbal), with neutral accent and good language comprehension
  * Willingness to work on swing/ night shifts
  * University degree in relevant field (i.e. computer science, engineering, etc..)
  * Sound problem determination and troubleshooting skills
  * 2 years of experience as a Linux administrator.
  * Problem solver
  * Excellent communication and listening skills
  * Team player
  * Very good analytical skills 
  * Eagerness/willingness to learn
  * Ability to perform under pressure
  * Ability to multi-task

**_Preferred Technical and Professional Experience:_**

  * 3 years of experience as a Linux administrator.
  * RHCE certification.
  * Technical Support experience by phone and email / Remote Delivery experience.
  * Knowledge of IT technology & infrastructure.

  
Additional information:  
  
IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal
opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for
employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or
expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or
veteran status. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment
practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.
title: Software Support Representative (Linux)

description:
|  We are looking for experienced JavaScript developer with excellent
knowledge in AngularJS to join our web development team.  
  
Heads up:  
  
We are as interested in your work experience as we are in the kind of person
you are. At Melon we believe there are three key qualities to being a good
teammate, as well as client: being smart, delivering results and being nice.
This is why beyond your skills, we value character, reason and sense of humor,
and we appreciate potential for growth.  
  
Our team is supportive, hard-working and friendly and we like to keep it this
way. If you would like to join Melon, here’s what you will do most of the
time:  
  
∙ Work on custom projects for clients, sometimes very closely with their team  
∙ Keep a healthy communication with your project manager and client  
∙ Take active part in all project stages – analysis, estimation,
documentation, coding, bug fixing and support  
∙ Develop our own products  
∙ Learn from your colleagues and teach them what you know  
  
Requirements:  
  
∙ 2+ years of experience using JavaScript and AngularJS  
∙ Excellent knowledge and skills in OOP  
∙ Excellent knowledge in jQuery  
∙ Good knowledge in HTML and CSS  
∙ Teamwork experience  
∙ Good communication skills (everything from showing empathy to being able to
present your ideas clearly and resolve conflicts in a non-violent way)  
∙ Good command of English (reading, writing, speaking)  
∙ Internal drive to learn, improve and succeed (coffee’s on us)  
  
Advantages:  
  
∙ Knowledge in HTML5 and CSS3  
∙ Knowledge in Node.js, Durandal JS, Backbone.js, Knockout  
∙ Knowledge in JSON  
∙ Knowledge in Jasmine  
  
Education:  
  
Computer Science or related field and/or demonstrated capability through
previous experience.  
  
What we offer:  
  
This is a full-time position that comes with a competitive salary and an
opportunity to grow within the company based on demonstrated merit.  
  
The key thing about Melon? You get an opportunity to tackle challenging work
tasks in a dynamic, but supportive organization. Our company culture is
people-oriented and informal. This mix attracts good teammates and interesting
clients.  
  
To apply, please send your CV with the position reference in the subject. If
you have written relevant code, we encourage you to send an example.  
  
Your application will be treated with confidentiality.  
  
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.
title: JavaScript/AngularJS Developer

description:
|

**Software Development Specialist - Sofia, Bulgaria  
  
Who are we?**

If you’re a smartphone user then you are part of an ever more connected and
digital world. At Amdocs, we are leading the digital revolution into the
future. From virtualized telecommunications networks, Big Data and Internet of
Things to mobile financial services, billing and operational support systems,
we are continually evolving our business to help you become more connected. We
make sure that when you watch a video on YouTube, message friends on SnapChat
or send your images on Instagram, you get a great service anytime, anywhere,
and on any device. We are at the heart of the telecommunications industry
working with giants such as AT&T, Vodafone, Telstra and Telefonica,
helping them create an amazing new world for you where technology is being
used in amazing new ways every single day.

******Role Definition:**

The successful Software Development Specialist will be working on one or more
specific modules within a large software system scope and will assume
ownership and accountability of specific modules within an application. You
will serve as an expert on specific Applications, modules or technologies, and
will deal with complex assignments during the software development life cycle.
You will join Amdocs Optima, which is designing and developing a converged
Prepaid/Postpaid product. This development group is in charge of Amdocs OPTIMA
UI solution including Customer data management, Self-care management and
more.** **

**Key Responsibilities**

  * Designs, develops, modifies, debugs and/or maintains software code according to functional, non-functional and technical design specifications. Follows Amdocs software engineering standards, agile (SCRUM) software development methodology and release processes. Ensures code is maintainable, scalable and supportable.
    * Provides technical support and guidance during solution design for new requirements, problem resolution for critical / complex issues. Highlights risks and helps mitigate risks from technical aspects.
    * Participates and leads the technical solution aspects of new sales opportunities by working closely with other solution architects, sales leads, technical and functional experts across the units. Present the solution to the internal and external customers.
    * Analyzes Product requirement documents, works closely with the Product Manager and Product Owner (the business owners of the Product) and come up with the solution architecture and high level designs. Performs impact assessment and Proof of concepts to back the solution and early detection of possible issues
    * Collaborates and adds value through participation in design reviews, provides comments and suggestions, and works with cross-functional teams to achieve goals. Serves as the technical focal point with other teams across the business unit to resolve issues related to interfacing functionalities and conceptual solution formation.
    * Brings continuous improvements/efficiencies to the software or business processes by utilizing software engineering tools and various innovative techniques, and reusing existing solutions.

**3 reasons why you should apply for this role!**

  1. You will be working within an extremely diverse and multi-cultural environment, and a fast growing and dynamic organization
  2. You will be provided with a rare learning opportunity within an experienced team
  3. You will be presented with a unique opportunity to get exposure to the latest technology, learn, innovate and grow.

**Critical Experiences and skills:**

  * **A university graduate with a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent**
  * At least 5 years of experience of OOP and design patterns.
  * At least 3 years of experience in NodeJS.
  * At least 2 year of experience of developing with ReactJS.
  * At least 3 years of experience in Bootstrap, JS, jQuery.
  * At least 3 years of experience in HTML5, CSS3
  * Experience in ASP.NET - preferred, not mandatory
  * Experience working with Java will be considered as advance
  * Experience in various DBs (MySQL/MongoDB/Oracle).
  * Experience working with Linux will be considered as advance
  * Proven experience in writing system design documents in English.
  * Experience with source control tool.
  * Knowledge in cloud technologies and tools will be considered an advantage.
  * Experience working in SCRUM methodology will be an advantage.
  * Team player with great interpersonal skills that can also work independently.
  * Self-initiated and quick learner with a can do approach.
  * Eager to learn new technologies and new concepts.

|

For more than 30 years, Amdocs has ensured service providers’ success and
embraced their biggest challenges. To win in the connected world, service
providers rely on Amdocs to simplify the customer experience, harness the data
explosion, stay ahead with new services and improve operational efficiency.
With over 22,000 employees serving customers in more than 80 countries, Amdocs
combines a market-leading BSS, OSS and network control and optimization
product portfolio with value-driven professional services and managed services
operations. If you have the passion to embrace a challenge, Amdocs would like
to talk with you. Together, we can experience success.

**Role Definition:**

****

The successful Software developer designs, develops, modifies, debugs and/or
maintains software systems, working on one or more specific modules within a
large software system scope. We are looking for a full stuck developer with
substantial knowledge in Object Oriented methodologies to work as part of a
team developing highly available solution with complicated data model and
great usability. You will join Amdocs Optima, which is designing and
developing a converged Prepaid/Postpaid product. This development group is in
charge of Amdocs OPTIMA UI solution including Customer data management, Self-
care management and more.

**3 reasons why you should apply for this role!**

  1. Joining an exciting multinational organization and working within a multicultural environment
  2. Working for a market leader in the field and benefiting from a great learning opportunity
  3. Being part of a friendly, longtime-established team.

**Experiences and skills**

  * A university graduate with a Bachelor’s degree in IT, Computer Science or equivalent.
  * Past development experience with NodeJS
  * Past development experience using ReactJS.

title: Software Developer - various levels

description:
|

If you’re a smartphone user then you are part of an ever more connected and
digital world. At Amdocs, we are leading the digital revolution into the
future. From virtualized telecommunications networks, Big Data and Internet of
Things to mobile financial services, billing and operational support systems,
we are continually evolving our business to help you become more connected. We
make sure that when you watch a video on YouTube, message friends on SnapChat
or send your images on Instagram, you get a great service anytime, anywhere,
and on any device. We are at the heart of the telecommunications industry
working with giants such as AT&T, Vodafone, Telstra and Telefonica,
helping them create an amazing new world for you where technology is being
used in amazing new ways every single day.

**Role Definition:**

****

As a Software Development Team Lead, you will lead and mentor a small team
within a specific task or project. You will also be responsible for technical
aspects of the project, to perform high-level design and enforce technical
standards, including software coding standards and those of tools and
platforms. You will ensure process alignment and team mentoring. Your role
also includes hands-on development. You will join Amdocs Optima, which is
designing and developing a converged Prepaid/Postpaid product. This
development group is in charge of Amdocs OPTIMA UI solution including Customer
data management, Self-care management and more.** **

**Key Responsibilities**

  * You will provide technical leadership to software engineers by means of coaching and mentorship throughout E2E software development, maintenance, and lifecycle to achieve project goals to the required level of quality, promoting engagement and motivation. 
  * Among your responsibilities will be to provide input to the software engineering manager for estimates, resource needs, milestones and risks, to get task assignments from the Software Engineering Manager and define work breakdown structure. You will plan and lead task execution by assigning software engineers to tasks, ensuring effective delegation, monitoring tasks, identifying risks and handling mitigation and escalations.
  * You will be involved in development by providing hands-on technical and functional input to design, maintenance, build, integration and testing of complex software components according to functional and technical design specifications. You will need to complete reviews, provide feedback and suggest solutions including operability perspective. 
  * You will be responsible to analyze and provide input for the requirements and impact assessment for new features or bug fixes. Make high-level design and establish technical standards 
  * You will represent/lead discussions related to product/application/modules/team and as a professional, builds relationships with internal customers/stakeholders as well as representing the team in front of the customer.

**3 reasons why you should apply for this role!**

  1. You will be working within an extremely diverse and multi-cultural environment, and a fast growing and dynamic organization
  2. You will be provided with a rare learning opportunity within an experienced team
  3. You will be presented with a unique opportunity to get exposure to the latest technology, learn, innovate and grow.

**Critical Experiences and skills:**

  * **A university graduate with a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent**
  * At least 2 year proven experience in Team Leading positions within Software Development environment. 
  * At least 3 years of experience of OOP and design patterns in NodeJS (and ASP.NET - nice to have skill)
  * At least 2 year of experience of developing with React.
  * At least 3 years of experience in HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JS, jQuery.
  * Experience in various DBs (MySQL/MongoDB/Oracle).
  * Proven experience in writing system design documents in English.
  * Experience working in SCRUM methodology.
  * Experience with source control tool.
  * Knowledge in cloud technologies and tools will be considered an advantage.
  * Team player with great interpersonal skills that can also work independently.
  * Self-initiated and quick learner with a can do approach.
  * Eager to learn new technologies and new concepts.
title: Software Development Team Lead
Gameplay Programmer

description:
|  VMware is a global leader in cloud infrastructure and business mobility.
Built on VMware's industry-leading virtualization technology, our solutions
deliver a new model of IT that is fluid, instant and more secure. Customers
can innovate faster by rapidly developing, automatically delivering and more
safely consuming any application.  
  
With 2015 revenues of $6.6 billion, VMware has more than 500,000 customers,
more than 75,000 partners, and 19,000+ employees in 120+ locations around the
world. At the core of what we do are our people who deeply value execution,
passion, integrity, customers, and community. Do you dare to do the stuff
you've always dreamed about?  
  
The major focus of the engineers in the Professional Services Center of
Excellence is working with VMware technologies that build the automation,
orchestration and management of virtual infrastructure and cloud. The team
delivers solutions that help customers to fully benefit from the capabilities
of a virtual infrastructure by integrating open source and third party
products and automating processes. To achieve this, the following VMware
products are mainly but not solely used:  
  
• vCenter Orchestrator  
• vCloud Automation Center  
• vCenter Operations Management Suite  
  
Our team is looking for talented professionals who share our passion for
technology, innovation and excellence to help us exceed customer expectations
and increase our market-leading position. We are targeting the enterprise
markets and our solutions must scale well with millions of objects so please
bear in mind that we need developers who understand or are willing to learn
the specifics of the enterprise level programming.  
  
Responsibilities:  
\- Be part of an integration and automation team that works in collaboration
with management, professional services, and R&D teams  
\- Analyze customer requirements to produce technical solutions based on
VMware technologies  
\- Conduct engagements with customers in a timely and effective manner  
\- Define estimates and plans for software delivery in conjunction with the
Project Manager  
\- Amend and refine custom solutions on-site in an agile manner  
\- Write high-quality code and script solutions in PowerShell, JavaScript, C#,
Perl, Python, Java, and others  
\- Perform code reviews to other team members and receive code reviews of your
code  
\- Adhere to VMware internal processes during the whole development cycle –
idea, patent, requirements, specifications, designs, implementation, bug
fixing, QA, support, and so on  
\- Build and maintain confidence of colleagues and customers  
\- Maintain current knowledge of the entire VMware product line  
\- Help document best practices in developing and deploying VMware solutions,
and feed them into our knowledge base for reuse by the team, customers and
partners.  
  
Requirements:  
\- Minimum 2 years of professional programming experience with one of the
following OOP languages: Java, C++, or C#.  
\- Scripting skills in any of the following: JavaScript, Python, Perl,
PowerShell, Bash  
\- Excellent analytical and problem solving skills  
\- Ability to work without close supervision and with proactive, goal-oriented
attitude  
\- Willingness to use different programming languages to address specific
project needs  
\- Familiarity with systems management concepts, processes and standards;
capacity and performance management and tuning; storage and network management  
\- Excellent written and verbal communication skills  
\- Fluent in English language: speaking, reading, and writing  
\- The applicant must be available to work full-time in Sofia  
\- BS or MS in Computer Science or equivalent technical experience.  
  
Any of the following competences and skills will be considered a strong plus:  
\- Fluency in German, French, Spanish, Italian or another European language  
\- Ability to travel up to 25% of the time.  
  
VMware offers:  
\- Attractive compensation package - competitive salary, flexible bonus
scheme, company sponsored mobile phone plan and additional long-term
incentives.  
\- Individual career path - management and technical career growth, enhanced
by learning and development program, regular performance assessment,
opportunity to work with international teams of IT professionals.  
\- Healthy work environment - company sponsored medical insurance program,
food and beverage program, sport activities, open communication.  
\- Work-life balance – 25 days paid vacation, regular team buildings and
celebrations.  
  
All applications will be treated with strict confidentiality.  
  
As part of the VMware global standards for integrity you will be required to
go through a pre-employment screening process before you join.
title: Senior Software Engineer, PS COE
