description:
|  Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) creates new possibilities for technology
to have a meaningful impact on people, businesses, governments and society.
HPE invents, engineers, and delivers technology solutions that drive business
value, create social value, and improve the lives of our clients. The largest
line of business - Enterprise Services produces better business outcomes for
our clients through our comprehensive Infrastructure Technology Outsourcing
Services. Our service excellence, with consistent globally delivered
standardized services guarantees clients peace of mind, while our ability to
drive innovation ensures clients a compelling strategy for the future.  
  
  
The primary role of the Technical Account Manager (TAM) is to deliver
proactive services and to provide technical advocacy to TS Support Services
Customers across the MEMA region. The TAM will also deliver Hardware Break-Fix
services to mission critical customers on a rotation basis. TAM’s must have a
strong technical aptitude for preventing problems. They are a valued technical
resource to customers, peers, and all members of the Hewlett Packard
Enterprise (HPE) Account Team.  
  
TAM’s are typically experts in HPE Technical Services (TS) Support Services
Portfolio. A TAM is a partner with their Proactive Service Customers and need
to have an in-depth understanding of the customer environments from both a
technical and operational level or may be un-assigned (aka pooled) to support
Proactive Care and Lifecycle Event Services (LES).  
  
TAM’s have very strong verbal and written communication skills. In event of
customer satisfaction issue, TAM will partner as needed with appropriate GSD
resources to ensure resolution. The TAM will work closely with the Account
Support Manager to create long lasting relationships with our customers and
create customers for life.  
  
  
Education and Experience Required:  
5-10 years’ experience in relevant technologies and customer environments.
Relevant industry qualification where applicable.  
Fluent English, French or Arabic would be a benefit.  
  
Technical skills  
Foundational level knowledge across all key technologies.  
Specialist level knowledge in Converged Infrastructure and Management Tools  
One or more of the following: BCS, ISS, Networking, Tape Library, Storage
diagnoses and resolution knowledge  
Customer’s advocate & technical focal point for the ongoing support of the
IT environment  
Monitor cases and analysis of customer systems  
Server Storage & Networking Experience a plus  
Experience with understanding:  
Hardware replacement  
Firmware upgrades  
Installing patches  
  
O.S. Knowledge:  
Windows, Linux or Unix  
Virtualization experience (VMware)  
Help Facilitate Meeting & Collaborate with other groups  
Knowledge of collecting/analyzing data logs & generating reports.  
Analytics, Trend analysis experience a plus  
Proficient with Microsoft Office products ( Excel, PowerPoint and Word)  
  
Customer Services Skills  
Superior verbal and written communication and listening skills  
Experienced proven problem solver  
Builds effective relationships  
Excellent planning and organization skills  
Strong time management and prioritization skills  
Presentation skills and ability to speak in front of groups (virtually /
onsite)  
Cross functional awareness  
Self-motivated and ability to work independently  
Ability to analyze trends and make customer solution oriented recommendations  
Ability to take decisions to enhance the customer’s support experience  
Ability to look at business opportunities  
Ability to work effectively in a virtual team setting  
Willingness to work on shift basis  
  
  
We offer:  
  
• Membership in highly qualified young, enthusiastic team;  
• Competitive remuneration package;  
• Medical insurance;  
• 4 days additional paid leave (total:24 days);  
• Food vouchers;  
• Life insurance;  
• Wellness program;  
• HPE badge program including various discounts for products and services;  
• Work-life balance program including free legal, financial and psychological
consultations.  
  
  
  
  
  
Thanks for taking the time to review our job, if you think it is a match to
your experience and interests please apply today— we are eager to learn more
about you! If you know a friend who may be a fit for the job please refer
them.  
  
  
  
This is to inform you that Hewlett Packard GDBC EOOD (HP) is registered as an
administrator of personal data to the Commission for Data Protection. Some of
the information that you provide voluntarily is personal information and falls
under the special protection regime under the Law on Personal Data Protection.
The personal data provided by you will be processed for the purposes of the
selection process as well as for the realization of the legitimate interests
of the data controller in respect of any future contract of employment. HP
takes the responsibility to handle, use and store your personal data, ensuring
its protection in secret from the third parties. We inform you and you agree
that HP may provide your personal data to government, municipal institutions,
banks, companies, corporate bodies and individuals, where such obligation
exists under a special legal provision, where it is necessary for realization
of your rights and legal interests as a participant in the selection process,
and when it is necessary to realize the legitimate rights and interests of HP.
HP can provide your personal information to corporate bodies and individuals
who are assigned to actions and activities relating to the selection process
and in respect of any future contract of employment.

description:

We are an international software company focused on mobile security, privacy
and end-to-end encryption. Our flagship products are the Android-based Secure
Phone and Secure Pack, as well as Secure BlackBerry.  
  
**Secure Group**, formerly DELATEK, is an international provider of solutions for secure mobile communications. As the name implies, we enable our customers to exchange sensitive information safely, protecting their business and personal life.  
  
We have built a name for our secure and user-friendly Secure Phone and Secure
BlackBerry smartphones, as well as Secure Pack – our suite of mobile
communication apps. Our products employ the best end-to-end encryption
technologies available.  
  
**OUR MISSION**  
  
Our ultimate mission is to ensure our customers’ cyber-security and enable
them to communicate in full privacy without compromising neither protection,
nor user-friendliness.  
  
**OUR VISION**  
  
No great goal could ever be achieved without a great vision. To accomplish our

description:
|  We are looking for a SharePoint developer to join our web development team.  
  
Heads up:  
  
We are as interested in your work experience as we are in the kind of person
you are. At Melon we believe there are three key qualities to being a good
teammate, as well as client: being smart, delivering results, and being nice.
This is why beyond your skills, we value character, reason and sense of humor,
and we appreciate potential for growth.  
  
Our team is supportive, hard-working and friendly, and we like to keep it this
way. If you would like to join Melon, here’s what you will do most of the
time:  
  
• Work on custom projects for clients, sometimes very closely with their team  
• Keep a healthy communication with your project manager and client  
• Take active part in all project stages – analysis, estimation,
documentation, coding, bug fixing and support  
• Develop our own products  
• Learn from your colleagues and teach them what you know  
  
Requirements:  
  
• 1+ years of experience in software development using SharePoint related
technologies  
• Understanding of the SharePoint platform, development and administration  
• Teamwork experience  
• Good communication skills  
• Good command of English (reading, writing, speaking)  
• Internal drive to learn, improve and succeed  
  
What will give you an edge:  
  
• SharePoint MS Certifications – not required but highly appreciated  
• Experience with SharePoint 2010 and SharePoint 2013 – CSOM, App Model,
SharePoint Online  
  
Education:  
  
Computer Science or related field and/or demonstrated capability through
previous experience  
  
What we offer:  
  
This is a full-time position that comes with a competitive salary and an
opportunity to grow within the company based on demonstrated merit.  
  
The key thing about Melon?  
You get an opportunity to tackle challenging work tasks in a dynamic, but
supportive organization. Our company culture is people-oriented and informal.
This mix attracts good teammates and interesting clients.  
  
To apply, please send your CV with the position reference in the subject. If
you have written relevant code, we encourage you to send an example.  
  
Your application will be treated with confidentiality.  
  
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.

title: Italian Technical Support Representative

description:
|  **Every day, people create amazing solutions at EPAM. Imagine, what you
could do!**  
  
Striving for excellence is in our DNA. Since 1993, we have been helping the
world’s leading companies imagine, design, engineer, and deliver software and
digital experiences that change the world. We are more than just specialists,
we are experts.  

Currently we are looking for a **Senior Delivery Manager **for our office to
make the team even stronger.

  
**Responsibilities:**  

  * Co-ordinate the preparation of customer proposals and statements of work
  * Participates in new business development
  * Deliver customer projects successfully
  * Manage customer expectations and relationship
  * Ensure that projects are delivered in line with EPAM process and methodologies
  * Address customer issues during an engagement in cooperation with the Account Manager
  * Make sure that the customer executes their responsibilities on the engagements
  * Identify and manage engagement risks and flag major issues early
  * Participate in overall project management, time estimation, and resource scheduling
  * Prepare engagement revenue and resource forecasts
  * Prepare engagement timesheets and billing information
  * Preparation of the weekly/monthly engagement reports
  * Prepare estimations on time frames, quality and quantity of resources required to successfully implement projects; develops project plan incorporating all project variables
  * Establish criteria concerning deliverability, performance, maintenance, design and costs
  * Assist in analyzing client processes through needs analysis and recommending new business models, workflows, or innovative solutions
  * Contribute to and manage engagement and process improvements
  * Suggest innovative solutions to business problems/processes that leverage technology to provide marketing differentiation, efficiency improvements, and better user experiences
  * Occasional mentoring of peers, including making sure that the offshore and onsite project team undertakes their duties effectively
  * Travel to client sites as needed
  * 

**Required skills and experience:**

  * **5-10 years’ experience working in consulting or outsourcing account/delivery management;**
  * Strong understanding of software development;
  * **5+ years' project management experience;**
  * Ability to establish solid working relationships with clients, plus the ability to work effectively as a virtual member of a dynamic, dispersed team and to meet deadlines;
  * Strong experience working with distributed teams on client side;
  * Excellent communication, presentation, and planning skills are necessary;
  * Expected to have exceptional organization, leadership and stakeholder management skills;
  * Self-motivated, multitasking, reliable to deliver on time, a quick-thinker, be able to work in a fast-paced work environment.
  * **Strong development experience with Java/C# or other software platform **
  * Knowledge in DevOps processes is advantage.
  * **Agile experience and/or knowledge **

  
**EPAM offers:**

  * Attractive salary, additional **health and dental insurance** as long as other **social benefits;**
  * **Personal development** program that will allow people to be valued for their**strengths;**
  * Wide range of **professional trainings** and workshops;
  * **Broad projects** variety and** possible mobility** between projects over the time;
  * **Experience exchange** with colleagues around the world;
  * **Work-life balance** and flexible schedule, team buildings and sport opportunities;
  * Modern office in the **Infinity Tower** business center. 

  

**About us:**

EPAM Systems is an **US based** software services and solutions provider
ranked **#1 in Central and Eastern Europe** with over 15 000 employees. From
software products to core business applications, EPAM has provided expert
consulting, development, testing, support and infrastructure services to many
of the world’s leading organizations. As the world of technology has evolved,
so has our distributed delivery model, which now includes advanced
capabilities in running **Agile and Lean engagements. **Recognized as a Leader
in Product Development in CEE - we have just opened our **office in Sofia**
and you have a unique chance to be a member of our Bulgarian team from the
very beginning. Join us now!

_  
If you are interested in this role please send your CV in English._

_All applications will be treated as strictly confidential._

_Only short-listed applicants will be contacted._

description:
|  Role Description  
  
As an IBM Software Developer, you'll use the latest tools and technologies
available to deliver state-of-the-art software. You'll be responsible for
ensuring that company software components are expertly designed, tested,
debugged, verified, and ready for integration into IBM's best-of-breed
solutions that help organizations improve their business outcomes in the
global market place.  
The application developer is responsible for developing and customizing Hybris
eCommerce functionalities for IBM client implementations. The role is also
responsible for performing unit testing and documenting the application code
and will communicate closely with the Business Analysis/Testing team. The
application developer will also provide technical support services during the
initial phase after the system is migrated to the production environment.  
  
  
Key Responsibilities:  
  
\- Implement and integrate e-Commerce solutions & services based on the
SAP Hybris platform  
\- Provide input for solution scope, design and estimations  
\- Provide subject matter expertise on Hybris e-Commerce.  
  
Required Skills and experience  
  
\- At least 3 years of experience in Java, Spring DI, Spring MVC, Spring
Integration  
\- At least 3 years of experience in Java 2 Platform Enterprise Edition (J2EE)
and Multi-Tier Internet Architecture  
\- XML  
\- Good understanding of the software development and testing process  
\- Excellent communication skills  
\- Fluency in English  
\- Fluency in Bulgarian  
  
For Back-End Developer:  
\- Experience with Design Patterns: MVC, Factory, Facade, Services, Strategy,
DAO, Inversion of Control, Encapsulation, Converter, Data Transport Objects,
Listener, etc.  
\- SQL experience  
\- Experience with Web Services (REST & SOAP), XML, XSLT, XPath, XQuery  
  
For Front-End Developer  
\- Experience with HTML, JSP, JSTL, JavaScript, JQuery, Servlets, REST-
services  
\- Experience with Spring-MVC, Spring-DI, Spring-Security  
\- Experience with Web Servers (most commonly in Apache-Tom Cat, and Apache-
HTTP-Server)  
\- Experience with design patterns: MVC, Facade, Inversion of Control,
Converter, Data Transport Objects, Listener  
  
Preferred Skills  
  
\- Experience as a developer in e-Commerce/Omni-channel projects  
\- Experience with Hybris e-Commerce or other e-Commerce platform  
\- Experience in integration with external ERP systems like SAP  
\- Knowledge of SAP-IDOC  
\- ANT, (Maven is a plus)  
  
IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal
opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for
employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or
expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or
veteran status. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment
practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

description:
|

**Who we are:**

**Tick42** delivers real-time software to some of the world’s largest investment banks and hedge funds. We are expanding our Development Centre in Sofia and are looking for clever, highly motivated **Clojure** developers.

**What you are going to be doing:**

You will get involved in developing new products and extending our existing
ones. You will deliver resilient, high performance, well tested code you're
proud of.  
****  
**What we are looking for in a candidate:**

**_Essential:_**

· Core Clojure - REPL, namespaces, special forms, destructuring, core data
structures (sequence abstraction, lists, vectors, maps, sets, queues), FP
basics (filter, map, reduce, functional composition and higher-order
functions), transducers  
· Using and writing macros  
· Concurrency (atoms, refs, vars, futures, delays, and promises)  
· core.async (channels and go blocks)  
· Testing with clojure.test  
· Building, packaging and deployment with lein or Maven  
· git  
· Candidates need to enjoy the challenge of complicated tasks and be excellent
problem solvers  
· Good command of written and spoken English  
· Ability to work independently or in small teams  
· Ability to work in multi-site international teams

**_Desirable:_**

· Experience with clojure.spec (it's not that new now! :)  
· Prior/current Java experience  
· Experience with Component or Mount libraries  
· 4clojure or github account

**What we offer:**

· Salaries in line with the highest in Bulgaria  
· Significant bonuses every 6 months based on personal and company performance  
· Flexible working hours  
· 25 days paid annual holiday  
· New machines equipped with the best tools money can buy  
· Private health care  
· Free Gym membership  
· Rest area with foosball table, pool table and sofas  
· Free coffee and beverage  
· Flat company structure with leaders that listen

Send us your CV, ideally with a portfolio/github repo(s) and/or code samples
you’re proud of.  
  
Candidates of interest will be contacted within 2 weeks of application.
Interviews are usually held in person in our offices in Sofia.

description:
|

**At HRS**, we believe the right job can transform a person's life and the right person can transform a business. We're passionate about matching our candidates with the right job.

Currently, our IT recruitment team is engaged in identification of
**experienced JAVA developers** who will make next steps in their professional
development at the **world’s leading logistics company – DHL.**

** **

**DHL Freight is setting up an in-house Competence Centre (CC) in Sofia, Bulgaria. **Join the new team and fulfil your career ambitions. At DHL, you will be part of a strong team that respects its employees, society and the environment. You will **deal with people from all over the world** and get the chance to experience the **unique international spirit of DHL.**

The Competence Centre will serve the role of a **software integrator and a
development centre for the newly acquired TMS **(Transport Management System)
platform. This is an exciting opportunity to work on an innovative solution
which **will be implemented globally**. The role of the CC will cover the
activities from software development through software integration and global
deployment.

In DHL, you have a strong partner at your side to provide excellent career
opportunities globally. As the world’s leading logistics company, DHL
continuously encourage you to broaden your horizons and fulfil your potential
via a wide range of learning and development opportunities.

The **Application / TMS (Senior Java) Developer **designs the required
functionality in a way that the application continues to perform as requested
in a high volume environment. He uses the System Requirements Specification as
input to develop the code. He interacts with key users from the organisation
on a frequent way in order to verify if the designed solution meets
expectation of the organisation.

**_Requirements:_**

**_ _**

  * Bachelor /Master degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject
  * Proven hands-on Software Development experience
  * Proven working experience in **Java** development – **at least 3 years**
  * Preferable experience with agile development methodologies
  * Hands on experience in designing and developing applications using **Java EE platforms**
  * Object Oriented analysis and design using common design patterns
  * Profound insight **of Java, Jasper and JEE internals (Classloading, Memory Management, Transaction management etc.)**
  * Excellent knowledge of Relational Databases, SQL and ORM technologies (JPA2, Hibernate)
  * Preferable knowledge of- and experience with Oracle DBs
  * Experience in developing web applications using at least one popular web framework (JSF, Wicket, GWT, Spring MVC)
  * Experience with test-driven development
  * Willingness to travel (up to 40%)

**_Responsibilities: _**

**_ _**

  * Design and develop high-volume, low-latency applications for mission-critical systems, delivering high-availability and performance
  * Contribute in all phases of the development lifecycle
  * Write well designed, testable, efficient code
  * Ensure designs are in compliance with specifications
  * Prepare and produce releases of software components
  * Support continuous improvement by investigating alternatives and technologies and presenting these for architectural review
  * Team-player’s attitude

**Working at DHL means taking responsibility, mastering challenges and continuously growing as part of a diverse and global team.**

** **

All applications will be treated strictly confidential. Only short-listed
candidates will be contacted.

description:
|  Global Engineering & Technical Consulting (GE&TC) is an
organization within Hewlett Packard Enterprise which delivers pre-sales,
consulting and engineering services for the Enterprise Services customers in
HPE. GE&TC takes accountability for infrastructure design and build,
develops architecture, strategy and roadmaps, performs IT workload migration
and leads infrastructure deployments  
  
The role of the Chief Engineer (CE) is to ensure the successful delivery of
integrated solution designs based on client requirements and schedule for the
account. He act as design authority of the customer environment and is overall
accountable for operational issues caused by implemented projects.  
  
  
Responsibilities:  
  
\- Ensure client satisfaction through the engineering of solutions that meet
specific contract requirements, standards, templates and customer expectations  
\- Be the primary point of contact to Service Delivery Executives or account
delivery leads for GE&TC engineering resources, delivery and overall
solution quality.  
\- Determine engineering priorities (in conjunction with Delivery
Optimization) for client deliverables and secures engineering resources to
deliver  
\- Understand all standard offerings for use in client environments  
\- Keep abreast of emerging technologies in the clients industry and HP’s
technology direction  
\- Understand and maintain roadmaps for technologies in use at the account.  
\- Provide thought leadership and innovation through recommendations
demonstrating an understanding of account's business model/drivers/needs  
\- Validate/audit end-to-end solution and ensure scope of solution meets
contractual and SLA requirements (availability, performance, capacity)  
\- Be the customer front end from a technical standpoint in regard to the
client requests – supports the AE or ADE in this regard, act as design
leadership for complex solutions  
  
  
Qualifications  
  
\- Meets degree educational requirements or has equivalent work experience.  
\- At least 4 years of experience with the 7 or more of the following
platforms: Linux, Solaris, UNIX, AIX, VMware, Windows 2008, Cloud, Workplace
Services, Hosting Services, Leveraged Storage, BUR, Application / Middleware,
Security, SRA  
  
Meets web infrastructure-engineering skills in the following areas:  
  
  
\- Web Server (Sun One, iPlanet, etc) (3 years of experience)  
  
\- Knowledge in Oracle Database  
  
\- Knowledge in Backup/Restore (TSM, Networker, Avamar, etc)  
  
\- Knowledge in Sun Java Enterprise Server  
  
\- Knowledge in BEA WebLogic  
  
\- Knowledge in Red Hat  
  
\- Solid understanding in Networks, Firewalls, Routers, IP Filters  
  
\- Knowledge in Load Balancers (BigIP/F5, Cisco) is a plus  
  
-Knowledge in UNIX Scripting   
  
\- Solid skills in using MS Project is a plus  
  
  
Non-technical Skills and Experiences:  
  
\- Demonstrates strong English communication skills (written and oral)  
\- Has strong technical project leadership capabilities and be able to deal
with complex issues with customers and vendors.  
\- Prior experience with application or infrastructure development projects  
\- Ability to manage projects within scope of responsibility.  
\- Ability to work flexible (8) hour shift following account working hours  
\- Capable of implement projects using ISO, SLC, and PM2.  
\- Ability to interact with customers regarding business and technical
information  
\- Demonstrates strong team building skills - ability to work as a team (PM,
Delivery, Client & Engineering)  
\- Strong estimating skills  
\- Demonstrate strong initiative to learn with minimal direction  
  
  
We offer a challenging role including:  
• Continuous learning and technical training opportunities  
• Great opportunity for professional development in the IT field  
• Part in a team that has established itself as a preferred partner for Hi-
tech Services & Support throughout EMEA  
• Competitive remuneration package  
• Medical insurance  
• 4 days additional paid leave (total:24 days)  
• Food vouchers  
• Opportunity to use free bus / parking  
• Life insurance  
• Wellness program  
• HPE badge program including various discounts for products and services  
• Work-life balance program including free legal, financial and psychological
consultations

description:
|  ProcessFlows (UK) Ltd - Branch Bulgaria (formerly Avanquest UK) is a
rapidly expanding British Company with offices in Sofia. We specialise in
providing I.T. based solutions to a wide variety of industry sectors, both
private and public, throughout the UK.  
  
We are now seeking another Helpdesk Support Analyst to join an existing
growing team.  
  
Overview:  
The Helpdesk Support Analyst is responsible for fielding and resolving
technical issues by utilising internal systems, troubleshooting utilities, and
support processes. The position requires close communication with multiple
departments while maintaining issue ownership. Full training resulting in
Industry recognised qualifications will be given to the right applicant.  
  
Requirements:  
∙ IT technical skills  
∙ Good analytical and organisational skills  
∙ Excellent communication and customer service skills  
∙ Customer service experience  
  
Experience with any of the following technologies would be advantageous:  
SQL databases and networks  
Document Management software  
Imaging capture software  
Optical Character Recognition (OCR) (ICR & IMR) software  
  
∙ Help desk and application support experience  
∙ Software troubleshooting/diagnostic experience  
  
Position Responsibilities:  
∙ Provide support to our customers and partners while being an advocate for
their requests.  
∙ Maintain ownership and follow through consistently on communication of all
Support Issues  
∙ Increase your knowledge of the supported product suite and other related
technologies  
∙ Communicate in a courteous and professional manner that inspires confidence
in your ability to troubleshoot and resolve issues  
∙ Understand and abide by escalation procedures and interdepartmental policies  
  
Working for ProcessFlows:  
We are a dynamic and rapidly growing service company with a strong sense of
dedication to our customers. The foundation of our success is not only its
technology, but its people. Bright, energetic, team players with the
confidence and desire to put their innovative ideas into action.  
  
Helping our employees to attain their professional and personal goals is a
high priority which we achieve through providing an environment that gives
employees the opportunities and resources they need to thrive.  
  
What we offer:  
Work in an international environment with young and dynamic team  
Possibilities for career development within the Company  
Competitive salary, with the added benefit of Medical Insurance after the
probation period  
Availability: Start immediately.  
40 hour working week  
20 days holiday  
UK Bank holiday in replacement of Bulgarian Bank Holidays where the days
differ  
  
Please send your CV`s in English, also indicating the level of salary you are
seeking.  
  
Please note we can only contact the applicants that we invite for an
interview.  
  
Location: Sofia/Bulgaria
title: Electronic Document Management System (EDMS) Technical Support Analyst

description:
|  Ние мислим различно, работим нестандартно, имаме интересни и разнообразни
проекти. Търсим нов човек, който да се присъединим към ядрото на нашия екип.
Търсим човек, който харесва това, което прави и не се плаши от
предизвикателства. Водещото за тази позиция е усета към красивото и
креативността, както и възможността да излизате извън рамките на познатото.  
  
**В работата си държим изключително на крайния резултат и съумяваме да намерим време да изпипваме това, което правим. Ние вярваме, че за да остане креативен, човек трябва да има време да събира впечатления и идеи. За това позициите, които предлагаме са за 20 часова работна седмица, а не за 40 часова, както е прието на повечето места.**  
  
За да кандидатствате по тази позиция ни изпратете CV и портфолио с проекти, по
които сте работили до момента.  
  
Какви качества и умения търсим:  
• Различна гледна точка, интересни идеи и нестандартен подход  
• Безупречно владеене на Photoshop  
• Опитът с HTML5 и CSS3 е голям плюс  
• Работата с AfterEffects за дизайн на потребителските взаимодействия е голям
плюс  
• Опитът с Illustrator е плюс  
• Интереси в областта на UX и User Interaction Design, както и желание за
развитие в тази област  
• Интереси в областта на фотографията  
• Фокус към детайлите и желание за постигане на перфектен резултат във всичко  
  
Какво предлагаме :  
• Изключително разнообразни проекти  
• Възможност да приложите уменията си и да се развивате работейки със експерти
в уеб разработките, социалните медии, видео продукцията и пълния спектър на
съвременния дигитален маркетинг  
• Гъвкавост и разбиране по отношение на работното време  
• Среда в която може свободно да изразиш себе си
title: UI/UX/Web Designer

description:
|

**Spintech** is a new and innovative gaming studio, formed by former** Playtech** executives and a team of young, enthusiastic and creative professionals. Spintech’s mission statement is to create the most attractive and unique games in the gaming market.

With a strong financial background and market leading clients, **Spintech **is
the right place for you to develop your skills, do what you love, and take
part in a true success story.

Spintech is your opportunity to team up with leading gaming and technology
professionals, combining years of experience and world-wide proven success.

**Lead, don’t follow - join our team!**  
  
  
**Position Overview:**  
  

  * Creates test plans, procedures, and manual and/or automated scripts based on design documents.
  * Communicates with Designers, Developers, and Studio Manager to anticipate issues.
  * Communicates feature changes.
  * Estimates QA hours costing for features.
  * Tests software for defects of design or code.
  * Reports defects.
  * Verifies fixes.
  * Works under minimal direction.
  * Determine and develop approaches to solutions.

  
  
**Skills and Required qualifications:**  
  

  * +2 years previous work experience as a QA Engineer (highly desirable slots/gambling/gaming) 
  * Experience in web and Flash applications testing 
  * Analytic skills
  * Good English (both oral and written)
  * Good knowledge of web (HTML, JavaScript) 
  * Solid understanding of testing principles and products delivery to market 
  * Experience in writing and executing test cases 
  * Good communication skills
  * An ability to learn quickly and adapt as technology changes
  * Precise attention to detail
  * Experience in automated Tests will be a plus
  * Experience in slot games will be a plus
  * Knowledge of UNIX-based operating systems is an asset
  * Knowledge of RDBMS
  * Knowledge of Windows-based applications is highly desirable
  * 
**We Offer:**  

  * Friendly environment of young and motivated people
  * Excellent remuneration and benefits package (additional health insurance, food vouchers, free snacks and beverages, bonuses, etc.)
  * Flexible working time and fresh atmosphere
  * Trainings and regular team buildings
title: QA Engineer

company: Микро Фокус Ей Пи Ем Солюшънс ЕООД
description:
|  
General overview of the role:  
We are looking for a passionate Engineer who is wants to grow themselves
technically, joining our established Quality Assurance Group working in a team
that will focus on the execution of automated tests across a multitude of
platforms and technology.  
  
Applicants will gain satisfaction from controlling execution of tests across a
large number of platforms and driving improvements in reliability and
performance of a critical part of product rollouts. You will have an excellent
attitude towards work and should be able to communicate with colleagues from
other countries as part of a wider located team.  
  
The role has a wide scope to allow for improvements in our internal systems to
enable the team to be more efficient. A pro-active and technically capable
individual would quickly become valuable for the team which could lead to
opening further opportunities within Micro Focus.  
  
  
Responsibilities:  
• Management of planned and unplanned test runs through the execution of
automated tests across multitude of Windows and Unix platforms  
• 1st line investigation of test failures  
• Raising formal defect reports and working with development teams to further
diagnose and resolve issues  
• Working closely with Release Engineering teams to improve our internal
systems  
• Monitoring load of test machines to ensure tests run reliably  
• Reporting of test results  
  
  
Required Skills and Experience  
• Basic Programming / Scripting knowledge with a high level of determination
to grow and learn in this area  
• Familiar with Virtual Environments and source control systems (SVN / VMWare)  
• A logical and analytical approach to problem solving and pays close
attention to detail.  
• Very good English spoken/written  
  
  
Beneficial Skills and Experience  
• Exposure to multiple platforms Windows / Windows Server / UNIX / Linux /
Mainframe  
• Experience in test automation and use of a range of testing tools and system
automation  
• Proactive communicator, not afraid to ‘stick their neck out’ to effectively
work with development teams globally.  
• Remote machine administration and troubleshooting (Windows / Unix)  
• Ability to resolve or escalate any issues found and be proactive and
committed to their resolution  
• Able to collaborate in an agile team and be accountable for their work  
• Can be relied upon to follow defined plans and processes  
  
  
Personal Attributes  
• Motivated learner  
• Proactive, hardworking team player with a will to succeed as an individual
and as a team  
• Good communication skills  
• Organized and methodical, ability to keep track of technical work and steps
taken while dealing with other numerous tasks  
  
  
  
• Competitive salary, bonus scheme and additional benefits.  
• Free English course.  
• Parking place.  
• Additional health insurance  
• Additional pension insurance  
• Additional holidays  
• Lunch Vouchers  
• Free beverages  
• Gym and swimming pool in Marinela /former Kempinski Zografski/ Hotel  
• Tennis table, console, billiyard and football table in the office.
title: Quality Assurance Engineer

description:
|  THE EXPERIENCE MATTERS  
  
C3i Healthcare Connections, a division of Telerx, is an American company,
leading provider of technical support services for life sciences companies
worldwide. We operate in the field of Information technologies (IT) and their
application for the needs of the Pharmaceutical industry and clinical research
organizations. Since we had opened the office in Sofia, Bulgaria in 2005, we
managed to attract many talented and motivated people and helped them develop
their potential.  
  
To ensure the expansion of our Operations Center in Sofia, Bulgaria we are now
looking to recruit an Italian speaking CUSTOMER SUPPORT REPRESENTATIVE.  
  
The CUSTOMER SUPPORT REPRESENTATIVE is a direct link between the company and
the customers located around the globe, looking for service. The function of
the position is to help customers by providing information and guidance over
the phone and via email.  
  
Main responsibilities:  
• Provide comprehensive support to pharmaceutical companies and life-science
organizations personnel (doctors, nurses, patients, sales force, etc.) in
Italian and English.  
• Adhere to high company standards for quality, accuracy, thoroughness,
timeliness and consistency in customer care.  
  
Job requirements:  
• Fluency in both Italian and English  
• Excellent interpersonal and communications skills  
• Willingness to learn and obtain new skills and competencies  
• Availability to work on shifts  
• Ethics, Team work and Positive attitude  
• High school diploma  
• Knowledge of MS Office, Windows and Internet applications  
  
What we offer:  
• Opportunity to practice your foreign language skills  
• Professional on-boarding and on-going trainings  
• Real opportunities for career progression with leading US Company  
• Competitive salary and performance bonuses  
• Social benefits package  
• Possibility to combine work and study  
• Vibrant environment  
  
Are you willing to build up your career with us? - We’ll be happy to receive
your resume in English!  
  
*Your personal data is secure with us.  
** Only candidates selected for interview will be contacted

C3i Healthcare Connections, a division of Telerx, is an American company,

worldwide. We operate in the field of Information technologies (IT) and their

To ensure the expansion of our Operations Center in Sofia, Bulgaria we are now
looking to recruit a TECHNICAL SUPPORT CENTER SUPERVISOR.  
  
The Technical Support Center Supervisor is the definitive source of knowledge,
technique or expertise. Responsible for maintaining a deep understanding of
the Client‘s technical and business environment, the Supervisor has a key role
in knowledge management, training, quality assurance processes as well as
operations setup and supervision.  
  
Main Responsibilities:  
  
• Participate in knowledge transfer sessions with client representatives.  
• Deliver account-specific training for new team members and  
• Maintain knowledge documentation and manage knowledge assessments for help
desk analysts.  
• Participate in or manage project implementations  
• Investigate issues and complaints and provide root cause analyses and
resolutions to management  
• Participate in client-facing communication - trainings, process updates,
knowledge - documentation review sessions.  
• Assist with fulfilment of any IT Assistance Requests for team-level
operational issues.  
• Mentor the team leads and help desk analysts Level 2 in their day-to-day
responsibilities  
• Monitor and act on key performance indicators for Service Level Agreements
and Operational Level Agreements  
• Perform regular utilization analysis and provide feedback to help desk

• Prepare QA/QC reports, analyze QA/QC results and determine per-process and

Job requirements:  
  
• At least 1 year`s experience in Technical Support Operations set up with
demonstrated progression of responsibilities  
• University degree (Bachelor and/or Master) would be considered a plus  
• Availability to work on shifts  
  
Skills & Competencies  
  
• Excellent command of English  
• Advanced knowledge of: MS Office, IE, MS Outlook and Active Directory;
Microsoft Windows 7/8 and iOS operating systems; Network administration &
Connectivity; VPN;  
• Knowledge of CRM systems is preferred  
• Excellent interpersonal and communications skills

• Quality orientation

What we offer:

• Opportunity for career progression with leading US Company  
• Opportunity to practice your foreign language skills and develop your
technical expertise  
• Competitive salary and performance bonuses  
• Social benefits package  
• Vibrant environment  
  
Are you willing to build up your career with us? - We’ll be happy to receive

title: French Technical Support Representative

description:
|  VMware is a global leader in cloud infrastructure and business mobility.
Built on VMware's industry-leading virtualization technology, our solutions
deliver a new model of IT that is fluid, instant and more secure. Customers
can innovate faster by rapidly developing, automatically delivering and more
safely consuming any application.  
  
With 2015 revenues of $6.6 billion, VMware has more than 500,000 customers,
more than 75,000 partners, and 19,000+ employees in 120+ locations around the
world. At the core of what we do are our people who deeply value execution,
passion, integrity, customers, and community. Do you dare to do the stuff
you've always dreamed about?  
  
As a Solution Architect you will use your knowledge and experience to help
drive post-sales product implementation and integration with key customers,
both direct and through channel partners. We are looking for a person who has
the right mindset to be a part of an elite tiger team of solution architects.
You must possess a unique blend of polished customer-facing skills, strong
learning development and presentation skills, and technical savvy; an out of
the box thinker, and the drive to engage all stakeholders with emphasis on
complete customer satisfaction. Solution Architect is a fast-paced role where
the successful candidate will wear many hats, and where you will be part of
the GSAAS team that embraces open communication, empowerment, innovation,
teamwork and a shared focus on customer success. Working with customers who
have already purchased, but not yet deployed VMware’s NSX product, in this
role you will ensure customer success and maximum value from their purchase by
providing Use Case definition workshops, feature walkthroughs, knowledge
transfer and best practices, and use case recommendations to accelerate
adoption at scale. You will also support strategic partners in growing their
capabilities through the development and delivery of training, ride along and
shadowing to help drive scale through VMware’s extensive partner community.  
  
Responsibilities:  
\- Design and develop innovative solutions to customer requirements using our
Network Virtualization & Security products.  
\- Maintain current architecture, design, implementation and troubleshooting
knowledge of the VMware SDDC Suite and Horizon Suite of products.  
\- Assist in the development and implementation of standard reusable VMware
consulting service offerings, including definition of tasks, deliverables and
estimates  
\- Document best practices in developing and deploying Virtual Networking
& Security solutions, and feed them into our knowledgebase for reuse by
customers and partners  
\- Develop training content based on experience of making customers successful
with the technology. Content consists of: whiteboard lectures, hands-on labs
with manuals, slide shows, etc.  
\- Travel around the geography (Americas, Europe, Asia/Pacific) presenting
training to channel partners (while maintaining highest levels of student
satisfaction) on how to sell and deliver virtual networking and security
solutions.  
\- Drive escalated support issues for key accounts as needed in tight
cooperation with VMware GSS. Bring a sense of ownership to drive end to end
Customer success.  
\- Lead on-site Customer Advisory workshops related to Use Case Development,
Design Assessment and Operational Best Practices.  
\- Recruit and mentor other technical staff  
\- Maintain per-customer view of reported issues, regularly communicate with
customers, sales account teams, NSBU Product Management and Engineering, and
GSS  
\- Successful track record with software & network virtualization and/or
cloud infrastructure experience with customer software integration.  
\- Drive client and internal resources and activities to ensure deliverables
within tight scope and time lines to ensure customer satisfaction and scale.  
\- Document all customer-specific configurations for GSS and PSO to share
account intelligence.  
\- Develop/improve workflow for more efficient delivery and reduced overall
time to production  
\- Work closely with NSBU Development to deliver high quality, personalized
support to assigned client projects. Drive customer satisfaction as well as
product supportability improvement  
\- Bring thought leadership around Product Success and self-driven to lead
with minimal supervision.  
\- Ability to travel  
  
Preferred Skills/Experience:  
\- Domain level understanding of Cloud Infrastructure & Networking (Data
Center Design, Network Architecture, Network Design, System Architecture
Virtualization, Systems Management, Security, Cloud Consumption)  
\- Strong IT Infrastructure experience  
\- Experience in customer-facing positions as a professional services  
\- Technical support experience dealing with product escalation of Cloud
technologies.  
\- Experience with modern software development methodologies, with emphasis on
software and hardware architecture, and infrastructure design and development  
\- Experience in a technical lead role for small-or medium-size teams  
-Experience developing and delivering technical software training: selling and delivering • Strong practical Windows Server or Linux systems administration skills   
\- VMware virtualization, networking and security products, solutions, and
services.  
\- Network Security Tool and Networking Concepts such as firewalls, IDS/IPS,
Load Balancers, Security/Trust Zones, L2 Switching and L3 routing. VLANs,
Unicast vs Multicast, Management Networks, routing, VPN and network design.  
\- Proven experience and deep knowledge of the networking technologies and
vendors such as Cisco, F5, Riverbed, Force10, Vyatta/Brocade, A10 Networks,
Arista, Infoblox, Palo Alto Networks  
\- Experience with specific network components such as ASR routers, switches,
firewalls, ASA, Virtual networking components VSG, 1000V), BGP & OSPF
protocol, Cisco UCS storage would be an advantage.  
  
-Good understanding of VMware and open source cloud consumption platforms such as vRealize Automation, Openstack , VMware Integrated Openstack (VIO) etc. Hands on deployment and troubleshooting experience with these products is a plus.  
\- CCNA, VCP-NV or equivalent certification and/or related work experience  
\- CCIE , VCDX-NV or equivalent is highly desirable.  
\- Familiarity with systems management concepts, processes and standards (e.g.
SNMP); capacity/performance management and tuning; and storage and network
management  
\- Understanding of modern IT production data center and Internet (ISP/ASP)
hosting operations  
\- Programming in Perl, Python, C/C++ or Unix shell are also an advantage  
\- B.S./B.A./M.S. degree or equivalent technical training  
\- Experience in software deployment in large-scale services in complex
environments  
\- Thrives in a small customer operation (tiger team) in high-visibility key
accounts.-• Ability to work collaboratively with product development team on
problem troubleshooting and driving product improvements  
\- Exceptional communication (written and verbal, internal and external) and
presentation skills  
\- Quality, out-of–the box thinker that is open-minded, creative, intelligent,
and self-confident  
-Highly entrepreneurial with a strong passion, urgency, energy, dedication, and an unrelenting drive to succeed and win  
-Team player that works well in collaborative situations and start-up environments  
  
VMware offers:  
\- Attractive compensation package  
\- Unique opportunity for professional development, enhanced by various
training options, regular performance discussions, working with teams of
world-wide Staffing and IT professionals  
\- Healthy work environment - company sponsored medical program, food and
beverage program, sport activities, open communication  
\- Work-life balance – 25 days paid vacation, team buildings and celebrations  
  
As part of the VMware global standards for integrity you will be required to
go through a pre-employment screening process before you join.  
  
All job applications will be treated with strict confidentiality.
title: Solution Architect

description:
|  THE EXPERIENCE MATTERS  
  
C3i Healthcare Connections, a division of Telerx, is an American company,
leading provider of technical support services for life sciences companies
worldwide. We operate in the field of Information technologies (IT) and their
application for the needs of the Pharmaceutical industry and clinical research
organizations. Since we had opened the office in Sofia, Bulgaria in 2005, we
managed to attract many talented and motivated people and helped them develop
their potential.  
  
To ensure the expansion of our Operations Centre in Sofia, Bulgaria we are now
looking to recruit a Business Analyst.  
The role of the Business Analyst will be multifaceted with primary
responsibilities focusing on analysis of different dimensions of operational
effectiveness and process compliance, presenting outcomes from analyses to C3i
Senior Management and Client Management representatives, etc.  
  
Responsibilities:  
  
• Create and maintain reports/dashboards to fulfill requirements for
operational and client-faced reporting & analytics  
• Perform volume/staffing analyses, determine staffing needs

description:
|  VMware is a global leader in cloud infrastructure and business mobility.
Built on VMware's industry-leading virtualization technology, our solutions
deliver a new model of IT that is fluid, instant and more secure. Customers
can innovate faster by rapidly developing, automatically delivering and more

With 2015 revenues of $6.6 billion, VMware has more than 500,000 customers,
more than 75,000 partners, and 19,000+ employees in 120+ locations around the
world. At the core of what we do are our people who deeply value execution,
passion, integrity, customers, and community. Do you dare to do the stuff
you've always dreamed about?  
  
We are looking for a project manager with a proven track record for delivering
high quality, well-architected products. As a project manager within the PS
CoE team, you will build solutions that help customers to fully benefit from
the capabilities of a virtual infrastructure by integrating open source and
third party products and automating processes. To achieve this, the following
VMware products are mainly but not solely used:  
  
• vCenter Orchestrator  
• vCloud Automation Center  
• vCenter Operations Management Suite  
  
  
If you are a dynamic, highly motivated person, who is looking for professional
growth and is up for the challenge, this is the place for you.  
  
Responsibilities:  
\- Be part of an integrations and extensions team that works in collaboration
with management, professional services, and R&D teams  
\- Lead the execution of PS CoE integrations and extensions projects towards
successful completion  
\- Analyze customer requirements to produce technical solutions based on
VMware technologies  
\- Develop and track detailed project plans, schedules, dependencies, critical
paths  
\- Effectively collaborate with project stakeholders  
\- Clearly communicate with customers and upped management any risk areas;
come up with risk mitigation plans

team

\- Help document best practices in developing and deploying VMware solutions,
and feed them into our knowledge base for reuse by the team, customers and

\- Present custom solutions and articulate how business requirements are met

Requirements:  
\- Proven success leading projects in fast-paced, growing organization
environment  
\- Deep (hands-on) knowledge in software development process - excellent
understanding of software development and project management fundamentals  
\- Minimum 3 years of professional programming experience with one of the
following OOP languages: Java, C++, or C#.  
\- At least 3 years of experience as a professional services manager,
consultant or an engineer, preferably with an Internet, Cloud or “Big 5”

\- Excellent analytical and problem solving skills  
\- Ability to work without close supervision and with proactive, goal-oriented
attitude  
\- Familiarity with systems management concepts, processes and standards;
capacity and performance management and tuning; storage and network management

description:
|  Estafet is a rapidly expanding, UK-based IT integration company
specializing in JEE, Oracle and RedHat Open Source integration technologies.
Formed in the UK in 2001, we opened our Sofia office in 2014, and this has
grown to 35+ specialist developers and testers working on high-profile clients
and projects. Our customers are leading UK based companies.  
  
You will work for Estafet ЕOOD, the Sofia branch of Estafet Ltd. We have an
excellent reputation for delivery and quality, reflected by our partnership
status with Oracle, Red Hat and Mule, We have won the UK Oracle User Group
Middleware Partner of the Year for the past four years.  
  
We have clear company values (openness, honesty, transparency, and being
specialists, delivery-focused and responsive) and are looking for experienced
software testing professionals who will strengthen our commitment to these
values. If you are a software testing professional looking to advance your
career in a progressive and expanding consultancy, then we would like to hear
from you.  
  
You will work as part of Agile Software development and test teams on
challenging technical projects to help ensure that the code delivered each
sprint meets the acceptance criteria; working with development leads to design
and implement end-to-end automated testing solutions across the platform. You
will write and execute automated tests, reporting clearly on issues and
summarising the results of test runs.  
  
You will operate across the full testing life cycle - from carrying out
exploratory tests; improving or creating tests to increase overall coverage;
assisting and/or leading in the creation of test strategies and test plans;
and estimating test activities. You will liaise with other members of your
team to ensure a consistent approach and a high quality solution is achieved.  
  
  
You should be -  
  
Degree educated (or have a relevant commercial qualification)  
Technically capable with an understanding of automated test tools (this could
include Unix scripting languages, Selenium, tools for testing web services
(e.g. SoapUI), Cucumber, JBehave, Jmeter etc)  
Able to produce automated tests utilising appropriate tools and scripting
languages  
Knowledgeable of Java or Python  
Experienced in testing APIs, web services, embedded devices and/or websites  
Familiar with bug tracking and version control tools  
Able to communicate clearly and concisely, verbally and in writing, actively
seeking information when required to complete a task  
  
  
In exchange we offer -  
  
Competitive salary  
Annual review process with performance related bonus  
Dedicated time for training and certification  
Health insurance  
Team building events  
Ability to work from home one day a week

description:
|  VMware is a global leader in cloud infrastructure and business mobility.
Built on VMware's industry-leading virtualization technology, our solutions
deliver a new model of IT that is fluid, instant and more secure. Customers
can innovate faster by rapidly developing, automatically delivering and more
safely consuming any application.  
  
With 2015 revenues of $6.6 billion, VMware has more than 500,000 customers,
more than 75,000 partners, and 19,000+ employees in 120+ locations around the
world. At the core of what we do are our people who deeply value execution,
passion, integrity, customers, and community. Do you dare to do the stuff
you've always dreamed about?  
  
Summary  
  
VMware is looking for an End User Computing (EUC) Domain Lead to join its End
User Services organization. The role will be responsible for leading VMware
into the future of End User Support Responsibilities, including but are not
limited to leadership in the global roll out of PC and Mobile end point
management tools, oversight of standards around but not limited to VDI,
Desktop OS (Mac, Linux, Windows), mobile and hardware standards.  
In addition this person will maintaining a strong working relationship with
the EUC R&D organization to provide feedback and help deliver VMware
products internally to VMware employees (VMware on VMware).  
The role will cover design and lead the EUC domain with close integration into
other Infrastructure domains like server & storage, unified
communications, and networks.  
  
Experience  
  
The End User Computing Domain Lead should possess a proven track record of
designing at scale global enterprise end-user solutions and possess the
passion, enthusiasm and vision for leading VMware’s internal End User Services
strategy. The role requires a thought leader in End User Computing that can
provide direction and innovation for a team who provides end user support for
25,000 employees across the globe, while ensuring all solutions meet the needs
of IT Security and align with existing solutions currently delivered by
VMware. The individual must therefore welcome the challenge of aligning the
End User Support model with other domain Leads including and security,
standards and practices. This includes functions gathering business
requirements, creating reference architecture standards, creating design
documents, and presenting solutions to peers and executive staff. The EUS
Domain Lead will also have the technical skills necessary to recommend and
design solutions for a global organization while also bridging the gap between
new projects proposed by other teams and existing solutions provided by the
End User Services organization.  
  
The role will have the following key Responsibilities and Deliverables  
  
•Overall EUS Strategy for the following services: VDI, Mobile, OS, Backups,
Management Tools and operation best practices  
•Own and provide roadmaps for End User Services IT department, including
Service and product (OS, tool and hardware) roadmaps and sunset products that
are no longer filling business needs  
•Represent End User Services at cross-functional IT project review board
meetings and governance meetings  
•Governance, relationship and operational management for enterprise-wide
projects in the EUC domain  
•Create run-books, operating manuals and Technical Design documents for large
scale projects  
•Service Ownership and transition to operations teams to Train staff on
operation procedures for new products and initiatives  
•Provide input on annual IT projects, and provide technical review and
approval for PRD and BRDs within the End User Computing domain  
•Ensure technical alignment across projects in the EUS domain  
•Provide escalation point for technical staff as needed, and mentor technical
and non-technical peers  
•Lead for enterprise-wide projects, manage the impact of in the business, and
drive for innovation  
•Develop an end-to-end view of the solution requirements towards
infrastructure, will develop long-term target direction and drive its
implementation on a day to day basis.  
•Define end user service catalog standards on various End User Services
technologies, VDI, End point devices, MDM, PC, OSX, tablets, cloud backup,
mobiles.  
•Support a culture of innovation to foster a competitive advantage in the
Identity Management services area via technologies.  
•Responsible for proper communication with IT functions and business, and to
meet IT needs and goals together with the Infrastructure teams. Act as global
internal IT business partner.  
•Collaborate with colleagues within the domain leadership team to provide
technical design guidance that aligns with the enterprise vision and
applicable technical standards.  
  
Detailed Experience  
  
•10+ years overall experience on core End User Technologies  
•Expertise in assessment, design, build and implement End User Technologies
stack  
•Strong analytical skills, with strong problem-solving capability  
•Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to
influence and work collaboratively with other Senior leaders in the
organization  
•Self-starter and highly motivated individual who demonstrates the ability to
exercise sound judgment, prioritize and effectively meet deadlines while
working on multiple assignments simultaneously.  
•Must have a track record in implementing technologies in a global environment
(including different cultures).  
•Previous hands on experience with the following required:  
•Expertise in the overall End User Stack technologies and competency in Active
Directory  
•Experience working with MDM tools  
•Understanding of client management tools such as SCCM  
•Deep Operating System knowledge and migration expertise in Windows 7/8 OSX
and Linux  
•Create, maintain and distribute golden images of Windows, OSX, & Linux  
•Proven working experience with installing, configuring, testing and
troubleshooting UNIX/Linux within a lab and production environment  
•Experience with Linux Desktops such as Gnome, KDE or Enlightenment  
•Networking knowledge (OSI network layers, TCP/IP)  
•Scripting skills; developing, maintaining custom shell scripts, able to
troubleshoot scripts related to Python, Bourne, C shell, Korn or Perl  
•Java is a plus  
•Knowledge of package repositories such as apt and yum  
•Strong SSH experience is a plus  
•Knowledge on multi factor authentication  
•Must have a good understanding of building and operating IT systems and
services.  
•Must be highly creative, curious and a strong networker.  
•Expert level knowledge of VDI and supporting technologies required for the
delivery of virtual desktop services.  
•Knowledge on Server Technologies, VMWARE SDDC concepts knowledge, VSAN, NSX  
•Knowledge on Unified communication Technologies  
•Certifications are a plus (VCP-DCV, VCP- DT, VCAP, VCAP-DT, VCDX )  
  
VMware offers:  
  
\- Attractive compensation package - competitive salary, flexible bonus
scheme, company sponsored mobile phone plan and additional long-term
incentives.  
\- Individual career path - management and technical career growth, enhanced
by learning and development program, regular performance assessment,
opportunity to work with international teams of IT professionals.  
\- Healthy work environment - company sponsored medical insurance program,
food and beverage program, sport activities, open communication.  
\- Work-life balance – 25 days paid vacation, regular team buildings and
celebrations.  
  
All applications will be treated with strict confidentiality.  
  
As part of the VMware global standards for integrity you will be required to
go through a pre-employment screening process before you join.

description:
|  Visteon is a global technology company that designs, engineers and
manufactures innovative cockpit electronics products and connected car
solutions for most of the world’s major vehicle manufacturers. Visteon is a
leading provider of driver information and controls, audio and infotainment,
and domain controllers; its brands include LightScape®, OpenAir® and
SmartCore™. With corporate offices in Van Buren Township, Michigan, (U.S.);
Shanghai, China; and Chelmsford, UK; Visteon has more than 12,000 employees at
50 facilities in 21 countries. Visteon had sales of $3.25 billion in 2015. For
our Design Center in Sofia we are now looking for a communicative and
organized person to join our team at the position of:  
  
  
System Requirements Engineer  
  
Your responsibilities:  
As part of our team you will be responsible for elicitation, analysis,
documenting and maintaining the product requirements specification for car
component like instrument cluster or body controller:  
• Collect customer documentation and technical requirements for the product  
• Define and follow up Requirements Management Strategy  
• Convey technical decisions and proposals to the Customer and vice versa  
• Analyze requirements and resolving stakeholder conflicts  
• Design requirements describing complete behavior of the product  
• Facilitate review of requirements with Software, Hardware, Mechanical and
Test experts and follow up of review issues  
• Perform functional and safety analysis, DFMEA  
• Facilitate product architecture definition together with Hardware,
Mechanical and software experts  
• Maintain traceability from customer specification over product specification
to architecture and validation results.  
  
Your qualifications:  
Positive and self-driven achiever with:  
• Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science,
Telecommunication or Automation Engineering  
• Experience in specifying, developing or testing electronic products  
• Strong analytical and problem solving skills  
• Experience with Requirement Management Tools such as DOORS, Teamcenter,
ReqPro and others  
• Open for travelling abroad and working in multicultural team  
• Fluent English  
• German or Japanese languages are considered as a plus  
• Certified in IREB is a plus  
• Experience in UML and Model Based Design is a plus  
• Experience in Project Management, Project/Task assignment is a plus  
  
Your benefits:  
• Possibilities for career development in international company  
• Professional development based on up-to-date training opportunities and
expertise  
• Competitive remuneration package with pool of benefits and incentives
schemes at place  
• Open and friendly working atmosphere  
• Social activities.  
  
  
Only short-listed applicants will be contacted.

automation and test execution). You will work closely with developers, QE

The team consist of highly experienced developers and automation experts, with

Advantages:

Advantages will be:

description:
|  **PURPOSE OF THE ROLE**  
  
The Lead Developer is responsible for the distribution of development work and
the quality of the development outcome managed by focusing upon technical
dependencies, hand-on coaching and code reviews. Your team may be distributed,
with teams of Javelin developers based in London Sofia and Plovdiv, and third
parties may be involved in projects from different countries, companies and
backgrounds.  
  
Working closely with the Technical Architect, Business Analyst and Project
Manager, you will help to define technical solutions based on client
requirements during the early phases of a project to deliver a world class
solution. As the technical lead on a project, you will achieve this by both
steering and directly contributing to the development efforts of the team.  
  
**DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES**

  * Work closely with the Architect to deliver a solution in line with the technical design
  * Develop any required proof-of-concept work as part of the technical design process
  * Be responsible for the Code Level Design, Organization of code, use of patterns for the successful implementation of a solution
  * Assist in the estimation and planning of development tasks and the production of project plans
  * Monitor progress and report back to the Project Manager and Development Manager
  * Report technical problems and work with the Technical Architect to resolve same
  * Provide recommendations where corrective action is required
  * Manage the resolution of defects
  * Lead a team of Developers ensuring the quality of delivery. This team may include 3rd party personnel. Quality assurance will include responsibility for code reviews
  * Take ownership of the successful implementation of the solution
  * Interact with the end client as required to ensure the solution is implemented as well as possible
  * Setup and maintain test environments.
  * Setup and maintain source control environments ensuring code integrity for all project developers
  * Identify and work to resolve any equipment and infrastructure issues. Support administrators when performing local upgrades and installations

**REQUIRED EXPERIENCE AND KNOWLEDGE**

**Essential:  
  
We are looking for a LEAD JAVA or DEMANDWARE developer**

  * At least four years of programming experience
  * Experience in leading a team
  * Knowledge of the full software development life cycle
  * Development within a Java Application Server framework (ATG, hybris, Websphere, Demandware)
  * Working knowledge of SQL to any of the main database servers (Oracle, DB2, SQLServer) including standard developer toolkits
  * Experience of using XML (in data loading or messaging, for example)
  * Knowledgeable in standard tools used in software development – source control, unit testing
  * Demonstrable usage of methodology (Agile, Iterative, SCRUM)
  * Working knowledge of Unix and Linux systems

**Desirable:**

  * Retail or e-commerce experience
  * EAI and integration technologies (for example, Websphere MQ)
  * Client interaction experience

**SKILLS AND ATTRIBUTES**

  * Confident and proactive
  * Will be outgoing articulate and literate, presenting yourself as a professional at all times
  * Must be self-motivated and disciplined and able to work on own initiative
  * Will be committed to the achievement of excellence

  
**EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS **

**Essential**

  * Computer Science Degree or relevant Technical Degree

**Desirable**

  * Java/Demandware certification

description:
|  The Cyber Security Analysts are responsible for delivering operational
services to outsourcing accounts on time, on target with quality. He/she works
on shifts which include night shifts. The Cyber Security Analyst focuses on
accepting and analyzing security incidents related to the supported customer
environments. The main goal is to acknowledge, classify, collate and qualify
all incoming alerts from the customer's production environment and to achieve
a high level of customer satisfaction and predefined Service Level Agreements.
He/she works in close relationship with other teams and is under direct
supervision by the team management  
  
**Job specifics/responsibilities:**  
  
Incident Logging, Categorization, Prioritization, Management and Closing:  
  
• Open an Incident record (where not already automated) for each Incident to
record and track all relevant information  
• Provide a complete history of events and activities throughout the incident
lifecycle  
• Categorize and prioritize the Incident so that it can be handled quickly and
efficiently.  
• Prioritize the incident based on the Incident’s urgency and impact to the
business.  
• Ensure all alerts are acted upon conscientiously and in the framework
expected.  
  
Initial Diagnosis:  
  
• Identify all symptoms of the reported alert in order to establish the effect
on End Users / customer business operations.  
• Employment of diagnostic scripts, tools, known error databases and knowledge
base to assist with initial diagnosis.  
• Engage the relevant higher level support team.  
• If the alert is believed to be a Major Incident the Critical Incident
Manager / Shift Manager / Security Incident Response Manager needs to be
notified  
• Ongoing support activities to be performed according to SLAs and defined
timelines  
• Provide highest quality and according to predefined timelines  
• Strictly follow HP ITSM/ITIL processes and procedures  
  
  
**Education (degree) and professional experience required:**  
  
• Degree/Diploma in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical
Engineering, Management Information Systems or equivalent certifications
(MCSE, MCP, Oracle/MCDBA, HP-UX, CCNA, CCNP, SNIA).  
• Minimum of 1 year experience within IT Operations, infrastructure services
support (Systems NT, UX, Backups, DB’s, IT Security or Network management),
operations monitoring and end user support.  
• Minimum of 1 year hands-on technical knowledge of the applicable technology
platform that you will be responsible for: Network management, Security and HP
Open View Products. Must be able to demonstrate troubleshooting and problem
solving skills.  
  
**We offer a challenging role with the following benefits:**  
  
• Continuous learning and training opportunities.  
• Competitive remuneration package.  
• Medical insurance.  
• 4 days additional paid leave (total:24 days).  
• Food vouchers.  
• Opportunity to use free HPE parking slots.  
• Life insurance  
• Wellness program including company funded sport events and seminars.  
• HPE badge program including various discounts for products and services.  
• Work-life balance program including free legal, financial and psychological
consultations

your knowledge of centrally managed environments focusing on the data
protection and end point security of workstations and servers. The services
primarily in scope are antivirus protection and personal firewall, data
encryption and data loss prevention. The team is operational 24/7 and work on
shifts including night shifts is required.  
  
**PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES:**   
  
• Centralized management of Anti-Virus software. Maintenance and support of
McAfee, Symantec, Trend Micro and Microsoft security products.  
• Dealing with viruses, Trojan horses, worms and other malware types. Prevent
Incidents or resolve them when they occur.  
• Maintenance and support of encryption software. Experience with McAfee EEPC,
Microsoft Bitlocker and Checkpoint will be considered as advantage.  
• Data Loss Prevention software support.  
• Provide technical support, including monitoring, reporting and security
software administration. This is most often done without direct interaction
with the end-users.  
  
**REQUIREMENTS:**  
  
• University degree in Computer Science or related disciplines. Alternatively,
an equivalent level of experience.  
• At least 1 years of IT experience, ideally in support of Microsoft-based
environments  
• Fluent verbal and written English  
• Strong technical knowledge of Microsoft operating systems  
• Experience with antivirus products such as McAfee e-Policy Orchestrator
(preferred), Symantec Endpoint Protection, Trend Micro, MS Forefront or
Checkpoint Endpoint Encryption, McAfee EEPC, Safe Guard Easy will be

• Autonomy and good problem-solving skills  
• Understanding of outsourcing services, preferably with actual experience of
outsourcing or service  
Delivery

**We offer a challenging role with the following benefits:**

description:
|

**About EngView Systems:**  
EngView Systems, part of Sirma Group Holding JSC, specializes in the
development of CAD/CAM systems for the packaging industry and in software
solutions for the measurement business as well. The company distributes its
products worldwide through a large network of partners and resellers, as well
as through own offices in Montreal, Canada and Sao Paulo, Brazil. It is
recognized from the European Information Technology Prize for outstanding
contributions to the generation and conversion of innovative ideas and R&D
results into products with strong market potential.  
We believe that every individual has the right to feel comfortable at their
workplace and to enjoy what they do. We offer our employees creative,
professional, friendly and open-minded organizational culture, since we are
convinced that self-motivated, responsible and creative people bring success
to the company.

**Job summary:**

The technical product manager is responsible for defining market requirements
and packaging the features into product releases. This position involves close
interaction with development leads, product architects, and key customers. A
strong technical background is required.

**Responsibilities:**

  * Gather and analyze information to define product specifications and review design specifications.
  * Define product specifications and or strategy.
  * Specify product requirements in the form of functional requirements, user stories, wireframes, and their objectives. 
  * Review product documentation and ensure successful product releases based on corporate priorities.
  * Create and own the product vision and strategic direction.
  * Contribute to the long term product vision, help build the roadmap. 
  * Communicate product strategy and functionality.
  * Conduct market research by working with internal teams.
  * Manage a product life-cycle from planning to tactical activities to cross company go to market planning. 
  * Define and drive the solution across all departments including the development of company wide go to market plans. 
  * Participate in customer facing events and conferences as a product expert. 

**Requirements: **

  * BA/BS in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  * 5+ years experience in software delivery, including a mixture of product owner, architect, and software developer experience.
  * An influential decision-maker and strategist.
  * A problem solver who thrives in a fast-paced environment.
  * Demonstrable knowledge of computer science foundations.
  * Driven by collaboration and open communication.
  * A communicator and a listener.
  * Highly developed English written, oral, and graphic communications skills. 

******What's In It for You:**

  * The opportunity to help great ideas turn into great products. You will have the chance to work with cutting-edge technology experts on product concepts and their innovative applications globally.
  * Opportunity to become part and to influence in a company where initiative and good ideas are valued and rewarded.
  * Dynamic, interesting and diverse work on global projects.
  * Good development opportunities.
  * Fun and friendly working environment where team spirit is essential for the company culture.
  * Competitive salary

If you feel interested and challenged by this position and if you meet or even
excel the given criteria, we will be glad to hear from you and to further
discuss your professional aspirations.  
All applications will be dealt strictly confidentially. Only short-listed
candidates will be contacted.

and technologies are adequately protected, in relation to client business

security levels on customer environment to Account management;

Client and HPE teams to ensure compliance, plan and track progress in case of
remediation needed
