description:
|  We are currently looking for highly motivated specialists (with relevant
experience or education), who want to develop their future career as Business
Analysts, taking part in Business Analysis and implementation of IT Business
systems.  
  
The project  
TMF Group is implementing its business systems IT Solutions roadmap
internationally and we need to staff our project teams with motivated and
knowledgeable individuals who would consider international exposure and
gaining BA skills as their career path.  
  
For this purpose we are staffing our Shared Service Centre in Bulgaria and
investing in development of needed resources.  
  
You are young, ambitious, and you want to develop sustainable career as BA?
Ideally you have already good background in Accounting, Finances or IT
Business Systems. Or maybe you have just graduated with marks of distinction
in the same fields from prestigious university and wonder about your future
career plans? In both cases we offer you a unique opportunity to enroll our
Programme, which will lead you on the way to become an established and
internationally recognized Business Analyst.  
  
Carefully selected candidates will receive specialized training-on-the-job and
will enroll for some of our international projects.  
  
Profile of potential candidates  
∙ Strong wish to develop his/her future career as BA.  
∙ Good background in one or more of the fields: Accounting, Finances, IT &
Business Systems design and implementation (possibly having had a role of Key
User within ERP implementations). Alternatively, young specialists from the
same background, graduated with marks of distinction from prestigious
universities are also encouraged to apply.  
∙ Very good academic or professional background in above fields;  
∙ Ambitious, initiative and willing to learn fast;  
∙ Loyal and ready eagerly to go for even routine tasks;  
∙ Experienced or ready to document business processes, preparing user manuals,
training the end user, etc.  
∙ Open minded and adaptive to other cultures, willing to travel
internationally;  
∙ Convincing and common sense personality, capable to inspire trust throughout
Client structures, on the base of deep expertise and understanding of Client’s
needs;  
∙ Team oriented and co-operative attitude;  
∙ Good communication/presentation skills coupled with the ability to liaise
with people internationally, through spoken and written channels  
∙ Very good written and spoken English language (a must, since most of
communication within the Projects will be with native speakers). Other
languages will be considered a plus;  
∙ Ready and willing to travel internationally, spending time away from the
base office in Bulgaria/Sofia.  
  
Working in TMF Group offers  
∙ An organization committed to developing people from a variety of backgrounds  
∙ International environment that provides broad relationships and experiences  
∙ Professional training and exposure to latest technologies  
∙ Full time job remuneration, following your growing skills level.  
  
About TMF Group  
Operating a network of more than 100 offices in over 75 countries, TMF Group
is a leading global provider of high-value business services to clients
operating and investing globally. We focus on providing specialised and
business-critical financial and administrative services that enable our
clients to operate their corporate structures, finance vehicles and investment
funds in different geographical locations.  
TMF Group serves clients of all sizes and from all sectors; everyone from a
technology start-up to a large multi-national. We work with more than 40% of
current S&P 500 and Fortune 500 companies and our client entity retention
rate was higher than 90% in the years 2009-2012.  
How to apply: You can send your application by 20 October 2016.
title: Business Analyst (BA) – IT systems implementation

description:
|  Искате да живеете в България и да работите с хора от целия свят? Чудите се
каква е перфектната работа за Вас? Уморихте се от безкрайно дългите
конкурси?!? Търсите възможност да започнете работа скоро и да помагате на
корпоративни и крайни клиенти на хиляди километри от Вас?  
  
Ние от Менпауър България можем да Ви помогнем в избора като Ви спестим време и
усилия в търсенето.  
  
** В момента търсим хора, които говорят много добре Немски език и Aнглийски език на едно добро ниво.**  
  
  
  
** Ако имате интерес:**  
  
• Да практикувате езика, който дълго време сте учил/а и не искате да забравите  
• Да предоставяте продуктите и услугите на доказана компания към крайни
клиенти и да комуникирате с тях чрез телефон, електронна поща и чат  
• Да поддържате взаимоотношения с клиенти  
• Да изпълнявате работата си с качество и без излишен стрес  
• Да бъдете част от международен екип, който е позитивен и забавен по време на
работа  
  
  
** Нашето предложение:**  
  
• Мотивиращи обучения, насочени към усъвършенстване на кадрите  
• Атрактивно възнаграждение плюс социални придобивки  
• Кариерно развитие  
• 300+ Нови приятели и много забавления  
  
** Звучи бързо, лесно и забавно, нали?  
**  
** Бъдете един от много хора, които са се реализирали, чрез това предложение**  
  
Ще очакваме вашата автобиография на английски език.  
  
Всички кандидатури ще бъдат разглеждани строго конфиденциално.  
Само одобрените по автобиография кандидати ще бъдат поканени на интервю.  
  
МЕНПАУЪР БЪЛГАРИЯ притежава лиценз за дейността си в България № 1385, валиден
до 23.12.2016г.
title: Консултант продажби и обслужване на клиенти с НЕМСКИ език

description:
|  VMware is a global leader in cloud infrastructure and business mobility.
Built on VMware's industry-leading virtualization technology, our solutions
deliver a new model of IT that is fluid, instant and more secure. Customers
can innovate faster by rapidly developing, automatically delivering and more
safely consuming any application.  
  
With 2015 revenues of $6.6 billion, VMware has more than 500,000 customers,
more than 75,000 partners, and 19,000+ employees in 120+ locations around the
world. At the core of what we do are our people who deeply value execution,
passion, integrity, customers, and community. Do you dare to do the stuff
you've always dreamed about?  
  
The Technical Publications team consists of over 60 writers, editors and
managers that work directly with product and project teams across the software
development lifecycle to deliver documentation for major and minor releases of
VMware Products and SDKs. Team members must have the flexibility and
versatility to adapt to the challenges that work on products with broad scope
and scale can bring. The team prides itself on meticulous, fast-paced, high
quality documentation. It is never boring!  
  
Technical Writer, End User: You will create documentation for technical end
users, system administrators, and developers. You will author content in DITA
and use a CMS to manage and deliver it. You will write installation guides,
user guides, API guides, release notes, online help, and knowledge-base
articles. You will contribute to the user interface design of products and to
the production of video material for VMware products.  
  
Responsibilities:  
\- Gather information by working closely with engineers and writers, reading
design documents and specifications, and using pre-release software  
\- Key Interfaces: Development Engineers, Quality Engineers, Product
Management, Release Managers, and Co-writers  
\- Create documentation plans and schedules  
\- Create and update documentation and help systems for minor and major
releases  
\- Review the human-readable strings in user facing interface  
\- Follow established processes and procedures  
\- Support and contribute to departmental goals  
  
Requirements:

description:
|  For one of our clients FinTech, we are looking for a self-driven individual
who can handle a top technical role in the company.  
  
Chief Digital Officer (m/w)  
  
You want to be part in one of the most innovative FinTech Bulgaria ever saw
till today?  
You want to gain insights into all aspects of a fast scaling company right
from the beginning?  
  
Our client is in the pre-foundation phase and currently executing a
feasibility study about setting up a pan-European FinTech based in Sofia or
Berlin. Pilot foreseen in Bulgaria up from 2016, market entry in Germany in
2017, further European countries by 2017 earliest. Key documents as pitch
deck, business case and cash flow projections have been drafted and relevant
market participants approached for continuously refining the business model
between the two poles of special assets and digitized sales processes. First
feedback gained by investors and potential clients, predominantly financial
institutions, is promising and therefore, the founders decided to recruit a
Chief Digital Officer for completing their team.  
  
Both founders, CEO and CFO dedicated to business development, are providing
significant own investments into the FinTech. German and Bulgarian natives,
they are experienced managers with comprehensive top management and C-level
expertise in the financial services area. They are pragmatic, fast moving and
eager to always go the extra mile. Their FinTech is the place to be if you
want to learn everything from a truly European team. They will bring you up to
speed and would like to explore together with you the whole potential of their
idea.  
  
What you do:  
• Responsible and accountable for executive oversight of all aspects of IT
operations, management and service delivery  
• Provide ongoing and regular engagement with the business to ensure that
vision, goals, and actions in IT remain in alignment with the strategy  
• Ensure quality delivery and support of all core technology services and
processes that enable the daily operations, particularly data assets,
networks, hardware, reporting systems, third party providers etc.  
• Set up a state-of-the-art IT platform for selling special assets to
investors  
• Drive one of the most reputable Bulgarian IT provider programming the
platform (SaaS)  
• Design SLAs and define best-practice KPIs for monitoring implementation
progress  
• Manage project within budget and within time with both, agile and classical
approaches  
• Ensure comprehensive documentation about company IT architecture and
processes  
• Execute any IT, technical and/or digital relevant ad hoc requests by
founders  
  
What you have:  
• Master´s in Science in related field (e.g. informatics) and at least 10
years of experience in the IT and start-up area, ideally with PhD or MBA
gained by leading reputable international institution  
• At least 5 years of leading large-scale IT and/or developer teams with a
proven record of success of (agile) project delivery in time and under budget  
• Skilled in programming, predominantly JAVA software, and in SQL data base
development  
• Hands-on experience in translating business requirements to IT specialists  
• Know-how in recruiting, establishing and leading IT development teams  
• Strong communication skills to inspire stakeholders (investors, staff etc.)
about our unique business model  
  
What you get:  
• Full exposure to our methodology and eco system, highly digital driven
processes  
• A unique FinTech startup with promising market feedback even before
establishment  
• Founders addicting to successfully bring the most advanced pan European
FinTech to life

candidates will be contacted.

description:
|  For our office in Sofia we are looking for a tester. You will work for our
company DEGIRO, DEGIRO is part of HIQ Invest and Fundshare.  
You will be part of the IT department which consists of around 25 people; java
developers, front end developers, system administrators and C++ developers. We
have three offices, our headquarter is in Amsterdam, for this position you
will first receive on the job training at our office in Amsterdam and after a
couple of months we will ask you to relocate to our office in Sofia.  
What we are looking for in a candidate  
\- Master/Bachelor degree in Computer Science or related field preferred  
\- Experience as a QA tester, manual and/or automatic  
\- Willingness to learn how to monitor applications using multiple methods
(application server logs, browser inspection tools, etc.)  
\- Experience with querying databases to create/validate test data using SQL
tools  
\- Affinity with financial markets  
\- Good spoken and written English  
\- Willing to relocate to Sofia  
  
What the job entails  
\- Prepare comprehensive test scenarios to cover all requirements through all
testing phases, including creating and executing test cases, functional
testing, integration testing, regression testing and mobile/device testing .  
\- Collect and aggregate information from the trading desks, clearly
articulate the steps required to reproduce a bug with accompanying details
(screenshots, test data, etc.) .  
\- Manage testing feedback, prioritizes defects and communicate with
developers to ensure proper resolution. Create automatic tests with
appropriate tools/programs .  
\- Maintain consistent dialogue with product developers and software
developers throughout development and test cycles  
\- Besides the tasks mentioned above we expect you to take active part in
improvement of QA processes and practices and be in trend regarding QA tools
and technologies  
  
We offer  
  
A fulltime job in a fast growing and international company where you have the
chance to first receive training in Amsterdam and later you will work at our
office, the Vertigo Tower, in Sofia. You will earn a competitive salary and
you have the chance to deserve a bonus. We sponsor relevant training and
education.  
  
Who we are  
DEGIRO was established in 2008 to service the professional market. DEGIRO
offers fast trading infrastructure at professional prices. In 2013 DEGIRO
started offering this service to retail investors giving them online access to
100 security exchanges worldwide at wholesale prices. Currently DEGIRO is
expanding the online brokerage within the European Union. DEGIRO is a
subsidiary of LPE Capital and a sister company of HiQ Invest and Fundshare.
HiQ Invest offers Fund Management and Fundshare offers fund administration
services. LPE Capital is active in Amsterdam, Hong Kong and Sofia.

  * Other duties as assigned, including support center level responsibilities

  
  
** Requirements:

**Essential:**  
  

  * Team Lead or Management experience in a technical support center.

  * Microsoft Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word, Outlook) advanced user skills

  * Excellent presentation and communication skills

  * Excellent English verbal and written skills and the ability to communicate with customers and staff at all levels

  * Decision making under difficult circumstances.

  * Flexibility and ability to and deliver in demanding and changing circumstances.

  * Develop, execute and track support center improvement programs

  * Availability to work evening/night shift hours.

  
  
**Personal Qualities:**

  * Problem solving with a high degree of analytical ability towards the business which assists in the process of identifying additional business opportunities and proposing and implementing process improvements.

  * Positive approach to change and ability to promote new ideas/innovation.

  
**Required Technical and Professional Expertise**  
  

  * At least 12 months of relevant experience in a technical support center

  * Team Lead experience in a Technical Support Center environment

description:
|

**Какво е GeoSCAN?**

GeoSCAN е разработена от „Техно Фарм“ програма, която представлява мониторинг
на състоянието на посевите, давайки възможност за следене тяхното развитие
почти в реално време и за вземане навременни мерки за подобряване на
резултатите от добива.  
Тя е базирана на най-съвременните технологии за анализ на изображения на
земната повърхност. Размерът на 1 пиксел е 5мх5м, а точността под 10м. Така
сензорите позволяват заснемане на големи територии в кратки периоди.  
**  
**Търсим да назначим опитен **“PHP Developer”**, който да се присъедини в екип Информационни технологии.

**  
Описание на отговорностите:**

  * Имплементиране на нови функционалности и развиване на съществуващи;
  * Използване на добри практики в работния процес;
  * Участие в разработката и поддръжката на софтуерни продукти;

  
**Нашите очаквания:**

  * Опит с PHP минимум 1+ години, обектно-ориентирано програмиране и MVC модел
  * Опит с релационни бази данни - PostgreSQL или MySQL или Oracle
  * Опит с JavaScript, HTML, CSS
  * Опит с PHP frameworks – Yii или Laravel или Zend или Symfony или CodeIgniter
  * Опит с AJAX и JavaScript frameworks – OpenLayers или Prototype или jQuery
  * Опит с SVN или Git
  * Добро ниво на ползване на английски език
  * Самостоятелност, ангажираност и отговорност към работата

  
**Предимства:**

  * PostGIS или други подобни ГИС разработки
  * GeoServer, QuantumGIS или познания по WMS и WFS протоколи
  * Google Maps API
  * JavaScript framework Sencha ExtJS
  * Опит с уеб базирани API, системи за разплащане и други
  * Unix/Linux базирани OS

  
**Ние предлагаме:**

  * Добро месечно заплащане и допълнителни бонуси
  * Обучение и добри възможности за професионално развитие
  * Приятна работна обстановка в бизнес сграда
  * Добра работна среда в екип от професионалисти
  * Гъвкаво работно време

Ако тази позиция представлява интерес за Вас, моля, изпратете автобиография
си. Ще се свържем само с одобрените по документи кандидати.  
Всички данни, предоставени от Вас, са защитени по смисъла на ЗЗЛД и ще бъдат
използвани единствено за целите на настоящия подбор.

description:
|  About Taulia:  
  
Imagine a company with the vision of fundamentally changing the pace with
which money flows across big and small businesses both in the US and
abroad…The greater the pace, the more quickly economies can grow and the
faster new jobs can be created. Welcome to Taulia.  
Taulia is a company of technical and financial entrepreneurs who wish to bring
simpler and more effective ways to facilitate commerce between the world’s
biggest companies and the thousands of suppliers who support them.  
Taulia's solution takes only hours to install, generates millions of dollars
of benefit, and is increasingly winning both national and international
recognition as best in its class.  
Coca-Cola Bottling, Pfizer, Warner Bros., Home Depot are among a growing list
of companies who have joined the Taulia journey.  
Taulia is based in San Francisco, CA, with multiple offices across the US and
Europe. We've been steadily growing and are looking for the next A-Player to
join our ranks. Have what it takes? If so, read on.  
  
  
About the Job:  
  
We are looking for a highly motivated, ready to learn, Staff Accountant who is
looking to gain exposure to a broad set of accounting functions. The ideal
candidate will have immediate availability to join in a full-time capacity.
This is an opportunity to develop your skills on the job by assuming
responsibilities in a fun environment with access to training, mentoring and
coaching from our finance team.  
  
Responsibilities:  
  
• Accounts Payable  
  
• Assist with Month End Close and T&E analysis  
  
• Prepare account reconciliations  
  
• Act as a backup for as needed accounting functions  
  
• Other accounting and ad-hoc analysis  
  
  
  
Requirements:  
  
• 2 - 4 years of work experience  
  
• Degree in Accounting  
  
• Strong critical thinking abilities  
  
• Excellent English skills (both verbal and written)  
  
• Strong communication skills (both verbal and written)  
  
• A positive attitude and exhibit initiative, self-motivation and drive  
  
• CPA desired  
  
  
Nice to Have:  
  
• Reliable  
  
• A team player  
  
• Extremely detail oriented  
  
  
We offer:  
  
• Opportunity to work directly with senior organizational leaders  
  
• Being a key player of a intimate finance team  
  
• Working with a multi-national team  
  
  
Taulia is a rapidly growing San Francisco based start-up with fantastic job
benefits, tier one investors and an entertaining yet fantastically competent
culture. Taulia is an equal opportunity employer seeking only the most driven
(and humorous) entrepreneurial minded individuals to join our journey.  
  
If you take your job seriously, but not yourself. If you enjoy the wild ride
of start-up life and being a part of a team that knows how to debate, work
with passion, and laugh. If you can make a positive impact on a company's core
culture then apply now.

problem investigation and resolution status throughout the support service
request case life cycle.  
\- Provide technical expertise in support of critical client situation
resolution.  
\- Work with suppliers, L2 and, if applicable, L3 OEM Development to drive
fixes for field issues.  
\- Interface with internal and external clients to explain technical
solutions, interpret manuals, resolve hardware component failures, and
maintain a high level of customer satisfaction.  
\- Generate technical documentation for service personnel and clients to
follow.  
\- Provide on-site assistance to resolve critical client technical issues
(when required).  
\- Flexible schedule to support 24x7 shift operations and on-call coverage (as
applicable).  
  
  
Required:  
  
\- Bachelor's Degree in IT related field.  
\- At least 1 year of experience in a technical support position – preferably
with Storage products.  
\- Experience in SAN Technologies and deep dive in Red Hat Linux and/or
Solaris, Solaris Internals, ZFS, Networking, NFS, CIFS, FC, ISCSI.  
\- Knowledge on VMWARE V sphere and ESxi Skill set.  
\- English: Fluent (Oral and written).  
\- Excellent analytics and problem solving skills, especially in multi-vendor
storage products.  
\- Outstanding teamwork and client communication skills.  
\- A high level of expertise on PCs and operating systems and their
peripherals.  
\- Experience resolving hardware related Technical Service requests for
storage products.  
\- Willingness to travel internationally on occasion for additional education.  
  
Preferred:  
  
\- Experience providing technical support for software defined storage
appliances  
\- Experience with other multi-vendor storage technologies  
\- Industry recognized associate, professional, or expert certification.  
\- Secondary or Tertiary Language Capabilities in: (1) Spanish; (2) German;
(3) Portuguese; (4) Japanese; (5) French; (6) Italian; (7) Dutch; or, (8)
Mandarin  
\- Two to three years prior work experience in multi-vendor storage hardware
maintenance or support.  
  
Soft Skills:  
  
\- Be willing and able to continue skills development.  
\- Communicate effectively written and verbal.  
\- Foster teamwork, demonstrate helpfulness and a positive attitude.  
  
IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal
opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for
employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or

description:
|

Looking for an opportunity to build amazing user interfaces from the ground
up? Tick42 is looking for JavaScript developers for working on client-side
JavaScript projects.

**Who we are:**

**Tick42** delivers real-time software to some of the world’s largest investment banks and hedge funds. We are expanding our Development Centre in Sofia and are looking for clever, highly motivated JavaScript developers.

**What you are going to be doing:**

· You will be involved in developing and delivering sophisticated single web
page applications and/or producing JavaScript APIs, tutorials and demos for
the company’s products  
· Communicate with clients and consultants in order to turn their requirements
into a working product  
· Select the tools applicable for a given problem and use them to solve it  
· Engage in supplementary activities: packaging, testing, and documentation

**What we offer:**

· Salaries in line with the highest in Bulgaria  
· Significant bonuses every 6 months based on personal and company performance  
· Flexible working hours  
· 25 days paid annual holiday  
· New machines equipped with the best tools money can buy.  
· Private health care  
· Free Gym membership  
· Rest area with foosball table, pool table and sofas  
· Free coffee and beverage  
· Flat company structure with leaders that listen

**What we are looking for in a candidate:**

**_Essential:_**

· Demonstrable knowledge and experience in JavaScript (minimum ES5)  
· Experience with AJAX, Promises and async programming patterns  
· At least one VCS (Git is a plus)  
· Candidates need to enjoy the challenge of complicated tasks and be excellent
problem solvers  
· Good command of written and spoken English  
· Ability to work independently or in small teams  
· Ability to work in multi-site international teams

**_Desirable:_**

· Experience with modern JavaScript - ES6, TypeScript or Flow  
· Dependency management using npm, Grunt/Gulp/Webpack  
· Automated testing using Mocha, PhantomJS or similar  
· Experience with ReactJS + Flux (e.g. redux) or AngularJS 1/2  
· HTML5, CSS3 (and/or preprocessors like LESS, SASS, SCSS)  
· Node.js + Express - for stubbing/mocking/demo purposes only

Send us your CV, ideally with a portfolio/github repo(s) and/or code samples
you’re proud of.  
  
Candidates of interest will be contacted within 2 weeks of application.
Interviews are usually held in person in our offices in Sofia.

description:
|  Are you friends with numbers? Do you want to develop great business
analysis skills, helping any business grow and amaze customers? If yes, then
get ready for an epic journey with the worlds No 1 personal systems and
printing company!  
We are seeking students to join our reinvented Internship Program in Bulgaria,
win alongside our remarkable team, learn and create their own future.  
By joining HP you will become one of the founders of a start-up company with
more than 60 years of history on the market. You will have the chance to learn
everything you want to know about our portfolio which includes commercial PCs,
tablets, notebooks, printing and also will be part of the leading innovation
in 3D printing that will revolutionize the manufacturing industry like never
before.  
  
The Business Management and Enablement Program  
Over 6 months, we’ll use our knowledge and experience to give you a real taste
of the most iconic tech company worldwide. We will teach you how to create,
execute and celebrate business wins. By joining the team, you will play a role
in business enablement (strategy, analysis and operations). You will become
the talent, everyone would want to have on their side.  
You will begin your journey in May 2016, going through an on-boarding phase
and two game levels:  
• Month 1: Taking classroom theory into practice, you'll start learning about
the business, our secret language and strategies, and getting to know our
amazing people. Your own opinion will count every day  
• Level 1 (Month 2-6): Then you will be given your own projects and play on
the battle field straight away. We will help you pick-up and conquer
challenges.  
• Should you show great results, you contract might be extended for another 6
months, leading you to Level 2 (Month 7-12): This will be your time to shine
and showcase all you have learnt so far. Expect to jump-over a raised bar.  
During the internship your Manager / mentor will keep a close look at your
development and will dedicate time to set clear goals and provide you feedback
along the entire program. You'll have access to 10, 000+ learning nuggets to
sharpen your business acumen and professional skills. Beyond that, you will
train, practice and have fun, alongside your intern peers, HP best
professionals, learning also from senior managers that can help you take your
career forward.  
  
Qualifications  
If you can recognize part of yourself in the described qualifications below,
then you might be the person we are looking for:  
• A business related degree full-time student, who has fully completed second
year of Bachelor degree and is already in his/her third year, Master degree
students would be preferred  
• Curious mind with thirst to pursue a career in the fast-paced tech world  
• Self-starter, you have played key role in extra-curriculum activities and
juggle easily with multiple priorities  
• Communication champ you keep everyone involved and on track  
• Relationship builder you thrive achieving outstanding results in
collaboration  
• Creative problem-solver you jump on opportunities to come up with
alternative solutions  
• Interested in data analysis junior Excel wizard, Power Point & Outlook
fan

title: Business Management and Enablement Internship

description:
|  At HP, we believe in the power of ideas. We use ideas to put technology to
work for everyone. And we believe that ideas thrive best in a culture of
teamwork. That is why everyone - at every level in every function, is
encouraged to have original ideas, to express them and to share them. We trust
anything can be achieved if you really believe in it, and we will invest in
your ideas to change lives and the way people work. This vision is what sets
us apart as a company. At HP we work across borders, and without limits.
Global virtual teams share resources and pool their big ideas to solve
business issues and meet personal goals. Everyone is valued for the unique
skills, experiences and perspective they bring. That’s how we work at HP. And
this is how ideas and people grow.  
  
HP is a proven leader in personal systems and printing, delivering innovations
that empower people to create, interact, and inspire like never before. We
leverage our strong financial position to extend our leadership in traditional
markets and invest in exciting new technologies.  
  
HP has an impressive portfolio and strong innovation pipeline across areas
such as:  
• blended reality technology - our unique Sprout by HP will change the way
people do things  
• 3D printing  
• multi-function printing  
• Ink in the office  
• tablets, phablets, notebooks  
• mobile workstations  
  
We’re looking for visionaries who are ready to make an impact on the way the
world works. At HP, the future’s yours to create!  
  
The Printing and Personal Systems (PPS) EMEA Managed Services Organization
offers Managed Services & Solutions to Enterprise and Corporate customers
combining Hardware, Supplies, Financing and Services in a Managed Print
Services (MPS) offering. The Managed Services Business is expanding and is a
strategic growth area to HP.  
HP is opening its doors for a highly motivated student with interest to
develop in an international and demanding environment. During the 6 months
internship program in HP Inc. MS organization, together with and under the
supervision of her/his assigned mentor, the candidate will provide support to
ADMs (Account Delivery Managers) and customers in various EMEA countries, thus
gaining practical skills and knowledge in the MPS business environment.  
  
Job specifics/responsibilities:  
• Support ADMs in managing customer change requests and customer queries  
• Manage day-to-day operational tasks and follow-up the successful completion  
• Coordinate all relevant resources (internal/external partners)  
• Meet the required quality of work in accordance to the team targets  
• Meet the deadlines and keep the service level agreements  
• Manages multiple tasks simultaneously with minimal supervision  
• Participate in projects working on process reviews and process documentation
under the supervision of the assigned mentor  
  
Qualifications  
Education (degree) and professional experience required:  
• Current university students  
  
Personal skills and qualities:  
• Customer oriented with strong English and German language skills (spoken and
written)  
• Excellent team player  
• Strong communication and leadership skills  
• Time management skills and working with tough deadlines  
• Flexible and eager to share and acquire knowledge  
• Confident telephone manner  
• Reliable, fast learner and well organized person with a flexible and
responsive attitude  
• Comfortable to work in a remote, virtual environment  
• Ability to easily adapt to organizational and structural changes  
• Process and Methodology focused  
  
Technical skills (procedures and documents the employee has to be acquainted
with):  
• Good computer literacy – (MS Office)

description:
|  Who are we

Ontotext received a couple of awards as the most innovative business in
Bulgaria. We enjoy unique position providing state of the art semantic
technology in two distinct but complementary areas – graph database engines
and text analytics. Our solutions have been applied in the areas of publishing
(BBC, Financial Times, Oxford University Press), life sciences (Astra Zeneca),
cultural heritage (British Museum, Getty Trust), telecommunications (Korea
Telecom), government organizations (UK Parliament) and others.

  
Your Role:

  * Architecture & development activities related to provisioning current Ontotext products and solutions on a public/hybrid Cloud
  * Participation in advanced research oriented projects in the area of metadata management, Open Data and Big Data

  
Your Profile:

  * Sound experience with enterprise Java and SOA technologies
  * Practical experience with DBMS technology, including RDBMS and NoSQL

Advantages:

  * Practical experience with Cloud Computing related technologies (one of: AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, Open Stack, etc.)
  * Good communicator

We offer:

This is a unique opportunity for an experienced software developer to help
shape next generation technology.  
Your application will be treated with respect and confidentiality!  
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

description:
|  **Komfo** is a Bulgarian-Danish software development company created in
2008. Our product is an innovative social media management system that
integrates Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, Google+ and more. Komfo has
a very strong position in the Scandinavian market with more than 450
customers, including Microsoft, Ikea, Telenor, Sony PlayStation, Sony Music
and more. Our offices in Sofia and Copenhagen (and since recently, in San
Francisco) currently employ 70+ experienced and motivated professionals such
as Software developers, DevOps engineers, Front-end developers, UI/UX
designers, System administrators, QA engineers, Project managers and more.  
  
**Technologies and tools we use**  
Our servers use Java for most of the core services and APIs. We have MongoDB
as our main storage, supplemented by MySQL, Elasticsearch and Redis. As for
client-side technologies, we're building a rich-UI front-end, based on HTML5,
CSS3, Sass, AngularJS, jQuery. We build cutting edge data analytics based on
HBase and Hadoop. In quality assurance, we are known for many innovations such
as: lightning fast integration tests after every code change (used to take
three hours, now it takes less than two minutes), dynamic test data generation
for every test case, and a next generation web services simulator for complex
social networks API endpoints. For our mobile platform, we're currently using
PhoneGap and exploring native development solutions. We use cutting edge
methodologies such as Agile/Scrum.  
  
For our expansion in Bulgaria we are looking for a:  
  
**Software Engineer**  
  
**Technical requirements**  
\- Experience with designing and building distributed web applications  
\- Working knowledge of Java  
\- Knowledge of PHP, MySQL and MongoDB is a big advantage  
\- Experience with modern datastores is a big advantage  
\- Experience with a MVC javascript framework will be an advantage  
  
**What we expect from you**  
\- Take active part in the development and maintenance of our Social Media
Management System  
\- Research better ways to build things and contribute with your knowledge  
\- Constantly improve the architecture of our platform and the infrastructure
that supports it  
\- Be a good team player  
  
** What we offer**  
\- Work with modern technologies and methodologies (Scrum) in small agile
teams  
\- Innovative, friendly and supportive environment, which empowers you to make
non-standard decisions  
\- Excellent remuneration with flexible social benefits  
\- Opportunities for career development  
  
All CVs will be treated in strict confidentiality and in full compliance with
the Personal Data Protection Law. The candidates approved for interview will
be contacted within 2 weeks of application.
title: Software Engineer

description:
|  Description  
  
  
Global Engineering & Technical Consulting (GE&TC) is an organization

takes accountability for infrastructure design and build, develops

solutions and/or services.  
  
  
  
The Consulting Enterprise Architect should:

roadmaps, and transformation plans.

technology portfolio.

title: Consulting Enterprise Architect

company: Hewlett Packard Enterprise / Hewlett-Packard GDBC EOOD
description:
|  Job scope/summary:  
  
  
-To operate large IT outsourcing customers, HP Enterprise defined a standard operation framework; it is a set of IT service management processes (ITIL) and associated technical tooling solutions deployed across the whole customer base: workflow, monitoring, service level reporting, configuration database, discovery, patching, service request management tools, automation, etc.  
  
-The design will cover the end to end service management tools required to operate the client: ticketing tool, monitoring, reporting, patching, configuration database, system integrations, self-service customer portal, automation, etc.  
  
  
This position is within the Global Engineering and Technical Consulting (GETC)
organization, as part the Service Management and Tools capability. You will
own defining the service management tooling solution used by HPE to provide a
variety of IT outsourcing services to customers (workplace services,
datacenter services, storage, cloud solutions, etc.). For each customer, you
will steer the solution towards a maximum re-use of HPE standards. You will
also ensure that the service management tooling solution is fit for purpose
and in line with HPE contractual obligations. You will identify any solution
gap and address it, working closely with internal tooling experts, other HPE
departments or HPE Software professional services.  
  
  
You will primarily be engaged post-sales to define the tooling solution design
and provide technical guidance to the project team for implementation. You
will also bring your expertise in presales phase, to help sales to finalize
the high level design.  
  
  
You will need to work on complex problems where analysis of situations or data
requires an in-depth evaluation of multiple factors. The position requires to
act as an end to end architect/solution designer, providing directions and
working with tools and process experts, each for their domain. You will need
to lead and/or provide technical expertise to functional project team working
closely with project managers.  
  
  
  
Job specifics/responsibilities:  
  
\- Lead the onboarding of new clients into HPE standard tooling framework:
define and document the high level design, maximize re-use of existing
standard building blocks and address any gaps.  
  
\- The design will cover the end to end service management tools required to
operate the client: ticketing tool, monitoring, reporting, patching,
configuration database, system integrations, self-service customer portal,
automation, etc.  
  
\- Evaluate current state, determine future state and design/document the HPE
tooling architecture and the integration points with customer systems.  
\- Own documenting the high level design. Review and sign-off the design with
internal HPE stakeholders and customer representatives.  
  
\- Guide experts who will produce low level designs, each for the tool/process
they are responsible for. Ensure the end to end solution is fit for purpose,
cost effective and leverages HPE standards.  
  
\- Review the solution against HPE contractual obligations and compare with
the planned service management solution. Highlight any risk/gap and work
closely with the project manager and project team to close them.  
  
\- Collaborate with the project manager to help define work break down
structures and detailed project plans  
\- Oversee and provide technical governance to the team during implementation
and test phases  
\- Engage in presales opportunities to drive standards, advise sales and
define solutions to achieve customer requirements.  
\- Focus on the solution design  
-Document known risks and assumptions  
-Review draft statement of work  
\- Contribute to the definition of the required implementation effort  
\- Capture and share lessons learnt, contribute to HPE tools architect
community sharing and receiving information  
\- Identify potential improvements in the service management solutions used
across the customer base. Contribute to specifying these improvements.  
  
  
Qualifications  
  
  
Education (degree) and professional experience required:  
  
\- 10+ years of professional experience and a master degree in engineering,
computer science, Management information systems. Relevant experience in IT
outsourcing or within a large IT department.  
  
Essential:  
  
\- Strong technical background with past exposure to multiple IT technologies
(networking, wintel/linux, apps development, cloud, workplace solutions)  
\- Past experience of designing and implementing IT services and solutions.  
\- Exposure to service management tools and processes, at minimum as a user  
-Client facing experience  
  
  
Desirable:  
  
\- Experience/understanding of a variety of service management tools sold by
HPE or competitors: Self-service portal, request management portal, system
integration, discovery tools, uCMDB or other configuration tools, HPE
operation manager or equivalent monitoring tools, Business Service Management,
HPE Service Manager workflow tool, business intelligence reporting, etc.  
-Past project management experience  
-Network security concepts  
-ITIL V3 foundation, TOGAF v9 is a plus  
  
  
Personal skills and qualities:  
\- Demonstrated ability to work with large worldwide remote cross-functional
teams.  
\- Comfort working with all levels of a business or IT organization.  
\- Strong leadership and ownership  
\- Strong interpersonal and teamwork skills, good communicator and facilitator  
\- Technical background and interest, allowing the candidate to quickly
understand a new solution  
  
  
  
We offer a challenging role including:  
• Continuous learning and technical training opportunities  
• Great opportunity for professional development in the IT field  
• Part in a team that has established itself as a preferred partner for Hi-
tech Services & Support throughout EMEA  
• Competitive remuneration package

title: Information Systems Architect

description:
|  Founded in 2004, Sofica Group has become the largest independent BPO
provider in Bulgaria, part of the American company TeleTech. Our experience
allows us to provide leading local and global clients with a broad range of
tailored BPO, ITO and HRO services. Currently we are searching for:  
  
Technical Account Manager  
  
General Summary:  
  
The Technical Account Manager is the primary point of contact to TeleTech
technology for both our internal and external clients during the lifecycle of
a client program. They are responsible for the successful management of the
programs as well as end-to-end technology including but not limited to
desktops, network infrastructure, servers, applications and reports. They are
also responsible for all communications to the client about all technology
issues, changes and new innovation initiatives.  
  
Essential Duties & Responsibilities:  
  
• Primary technology point of contact for operations, sales and external
clients for their program;  
• Participates closely with the management teams of TeleTech's Operations and
other business owners to ensure quality customer support;  
• Will be responsible for Implementing TeleTech standards for maintaining a
stable environment in addition to making recommendations for updated
standards;  
• Will have responsibility of ensuring that all aspects of technology for the
program are within contractual specifications as well as that all aspects of
technology are in full working order for their clients program;  
• Keeps a centralized tracker of YTD outages, issues, change requests,
penalties and technology related revenue for the program;  
• Helps manage resolution of Teletech agent impacting outages. Keeps client
posted of progress throughout the fix process and provides after action report
to client within contractually agreed upon time period;  
• Communicates planned changes to clients with detailed area of impact and
risk mitigation strategy within agreed notification timeframe, or best effort
thereof;  
• Receives new client work requests. Provides time and cost estimates for work
requests within two working days of request. Ensures work requests are
complete within agreed on timeline.  
• Implements and enforces project change management processes, including
documenting financial implications of changes and coordinating cross-
functional IT teams to get changes completed successfully.  
• Provides weekly status to internal and external clients for programs
technology - outages, change requests, etc. Provides a weekly summary of
client program status for the Weekly CIO update.  
  
Job Specifications:  
  
• 5 years managing Information Technology teams or project teams;  
• Experience working in Account Management with heavy client interaction;  
• 3-5 years experience in a call center environment;  
• Thorough knowledge of network protocols and operation, desktop operating
systems and capabilities, and troubleshooting techniques;  
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English;  
• Prefer certifiable technical skills. Acceptable certifications include but
are not limited to Associate or Bachelor Degree in Computer Science, Microsoft
Certified Product Specialist (MCPS), Microsoft Certified Engineer (MSCE);  
• Must have a completed end-to-end understanding of the programs specific
technology – infrastructure and applications (desktop to datacenter);  
• Has a full understanding of the contractual agreement with regards to
technology specifications, SLA’s, penalties, change management and billing for
the program.  
  
If you consider we can make a good team together please send your CV in
English stating the position you are applying for.  
  
All documents will be treated in the strictest confidentiality.  
  
Only short-listed candidates will be invited for an interview.

company: Hewlett Packard Enterprise / Hewlett-Packard GDBC EOOD
description:
|  Global Engineering & Technical Consulting (GE&TC) is an
organization within Hewlett Packard Enterprise which delivers pre-sales,
consulting and engineering services for the Enterprise Services customers in
HPE. GE&TC takes accountability for infrastructure design and build,
develops architecture, strategy and roadmaps, performs IT workload migration
and leads infrastructure deployments.  
  
Job scope/summary:  
The workplace services Architect intervenes most of the time in Transformation
projects, and sometimes in the pre-sales and service delivery phases. In a
Transformation project, he/she is typically the main technical resource,
working closely with the Program/Project Manager. This is a customer-facing
position, involving some travel. It will require a high level of involvement
in the project, and availability. The functional scope covered includes, but
is not limited to the workplace domain. The architect will address technical
considerations and issues in technical areas within workplace, or for which
there is a dependency with the WPS domain, such as Wintel server management.  
This role requires solid knowledge about desktop management services, such as
software management, virtualization and deployment, and also basic knowledge
in the areas surrounding desktop management such as desktop security, asset
management, onsite and remote support. Since the role is rather “horizontal”,
it does not require being a specialist in one of these areas.  
The integration architect will join a team of architects located all over
Europe.  
  
Job specifics/responsibilities:  
As part of transformation:  
• Own end to end solutions and High Level Design for Workplace Services  
• Contribute and review Low Level Design from project streams  
• Analyze the contract and ensure the defined solution is aligned with HPE’s
contractual obligations  
• Support the Project Manager to create the project plan and to identify risks
and timing  
• Lead the Hand-over to production  
• Participate in the Design Authority during transformation  
• Lead the Execution of test and pilots  
• Promote standardization and automation during transformation in T&T
engagements  
• Architect non-standard solutions  
  
  
Qualifications  
• Education (degree) and professional experience required:  
8 + years of professional experience and a Bachelor of Arts/Science or
equivalent degree in computer science or related area of study; without a
degree, 3 additional years of relevant professional experience  
• Fluent in English language , spoken and written  
• Additional languages is a plus  
  
Technical skills (procedures and documents the employee has to be acquainted
with):  
Has mastered at least one technical discipline with strong knowledge in at
least three major technology areas.  
• Software distribution  
• Image management  
• Software lifecycle services  
• Technical desktop integration  
• Virtualization, thin clients  
• Messaging, Office365, Lync knowledge is a plus  
  
Business skills and qualities:  
• Ability to meet strict deadlines.  
• Experience with large companies and mass rollout is a plus  
• Self-learner  
• Able to lead and motivate a technical team  
• Natural leader  
• Experience in a customer facing role  
• Consulting skills  
• Confident Communication and presentation skills  
• Good understanding of Program and Project Management.  
• Understanding of Change Management  
• Ability to translate technical details into concise and easy to understand
written form. Ability to write relevant components of a proposal document.

company: Hewlett Packard Enterprise / Hewlett-Packard GDBC EOOD
description:
|  Description  
  
Global Engineering and Technical Consulting team is responsible for
architecture and engineering and integration of DCS & Cloud solutions
based on the standards or nonstandard portfolio offerings. Often our services
are utilized during the transformation phase to help a client move from
“current state” to “future state”. We enable accounts and delivery teams to
provide DCS and Cloud Services that were contracted with the client.  
  
  
Job scope / Summary  
  
Applies Windows Operating System technical knowledge to solve complex business
requirements and is regarded as a subject matter expert. Uses consulting
skills including, but not limited to: interviewing clients to understand
business needs, developing technical solutions, migration plans and working
with multiple teams to accomplish project deliverables. Capable of consulting,
designing, testing, implementing, managing capability requirements into a new
or existing infrastructure using HP methodology. Able to integrate custom
software components into the environment and provide third level production
infrastructure support.  
  
  
Job specifics/responsibilities:  
  
•Responsible for preparing and planning of server migrations  
•Responsible for client/account interactions as required  
•Responsible for communication and close collaboration with the Migration
Technical Lead  
•Responsible for defining the methodologies that will be used by System
Administrators for migrating from the CMO to the FMO  
•Responsible for providing third level production support during a migration
phase for other involved teams  
•Responsible for producing part or all of the technical solution for the
account/client, in accordance with an agreed technical design  
•Responsible to make sure that the project deliverable is completed accurately
and on time  
•Responsible for escalating issues, problems, risks, and constraints to the
appropriate parties for clarification and resolution  
•Responsible for keeping abreast of new/emerging technology  
•Responsible for design, development, implementation using the Global
Engineering specifications, methodology and practical application of ITIL
practices and processes  
•Responsible for documenting project requirements, risks, design, test plans,
deployment procedures and operation/support procedures following the Global
Engineering Quality Management Process (GE QMS) standards  
  
  
  
Qualifications  
  
Education (degree) and professional experience required:  
  
•Degree/Diploma in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical
Engineering, Management Information Systems, MBA or equivalent  
•Minimum 5 years of experience in the IT Services industry  
  
Other requirements:  
  
•English fluent mandatory  
  
Technical skills:  
  
•Demonstrates specialist understanding of both server hardware & server
operating system deployment, configuration, testing & administration.  
•Demonstrates specialist understanding in at least one of the following
migration tools: DoubleTake, Platespin, VMWare vCenter Converter, Robocopy,
AppZero  
•Demonstrates specialist understanding of script debugging & automation
principles with prior experience of working in PowerShell, VBScript and
associated scripting/mark-up languages (e.g. Batch files, HTML, and XML).  
•Experienced troubleshooting to a specialist level within Microsoft Windows
Server Network Infrastructures.  
•Knowledge and understanding of:  
  
◦Microsoft Active Directory  
◦Core Windows Network Services  
◦Advanced Windows Network Services  
◦Network technologies  
  
Technical background in one or more of the following is considered as
advantage:  
  
•Private Cloud and Virtual Private Cloud technologies  
•Hypervisor technologies (Hyper-V, VMWare,…)  
•Ability to Design, install, configure, optimize and document Windows Server
2003 to Windows Server 2012 environments:  
  
◦File and Print Server Migrations  
◦Microsoft Cluster Service (Windows 2003) and Failover Clustering (Windows
2008 and 2012)  
◦Active Directory and DNS  
  
•Experience with Backup solutions  
•Experience with Storage Solutions

description:
|  Deltastock AD is a leader in online Forex and CFD trading services. Since
its incorporation in 1998, Deltastock has been developing and improving its
own online trading platforms. The company offers its services to individual
and institutional investors in more than 100 countries worldwide. Deltastock
also provides comprehensive solutions for online trading in London, UK, and
Bucharest, Romania.  
  
Deltastock is now looking to expand it’s operation and is seeking to fill its
ranks with professionals in the IT sector for the position "Software
Specialist".  
  
  
Duties required:  
  
\- Designs, modifies, develops, writes and implements software programming
applications with VB6;  
\- Full cooperation with our team and management;  
\- Create, maintain and develop documentations.  
  
Requirements:  
  
\- Programming languages: VB6, knowledge of VB.Net and C# are advantage;  
\- Knowledge on MS SQL;  
\- 5+ years experience as a developer.  
  
Here at Deltastock we value loyalty, creativity, collaboration and hard work.
Our team consists of talented visionaries with curious minds and limitless
enthusiasm, and you now get to join this team of exceptional professionals.  
  
Willing to tag along? Submit your application right away!  
  
  
All applications will be treated in strict confidentiality. Only short-listed
candidates will be contacted for an interview.
title: Software Specialist

description:
|  Every day, people create amazing solutions at EPAM. Imagine, what you could
do!  
  
  
About us:  
  
Striving for excellence is in our DNA. Since 1993, we have been helping the
world’s leading companies imagine, design, engineer, and deliver software and
digital experiences that change the world. We are more than just specialists,
we are experts.  
  
EPAM Systems reached 20 000 employees in July. EPAM Bulgaria currently has
more than 7 partners with more than 180 employees and we plan to continue
expanding our Bulgaria business!  
  
For one of our latest project we are forming a new team and looking for SAP
ABAP Developer  
  
  
**Main Responsibilities:**  
  

  * To provide input into the design of SAP enhancements and roll outs, offering advice and thoughts providing feedback.
  * To develop quality code and its associated documentation adhering to team and departmental development standards.
  * To demonstrate a logical and structured approach to time management and task prioritization.
  * To participate in team activities and team planning with the aim of improving team skills, awareness and quality of work.
  * As an ABAP OO developer, you implement with Object Oriented ABAP Programming new applications, optimize and maintain existing solutions in one of the biggest SAP-System landscape in Europe.
  * You design in agile method with process experts, complex solutions for business requirements and international projects.
  * In addition, you will accompany us on our way, to maximize the potential of current technologies (SAP HANA, SAPUI5, Fiori) in the SAP environment for our customers.
  * Among other things, you will deal with implementation of SAPUI5 applications as well as the creation of Adobe Interactive Forms.
  * Furthermore, you act in the innovation process with our SAP development team, in the evaluation of future technologies also you have a continuous dialogue with all ABAP experts of our company and you can expand your knowledge.

  
  
**Your profile:**  
  

  * Proven 3+ years of professional experience with SAP ABAP
  * Knowledge in Object Oriented Programming
  * Expertise in customized SAP System environment
  * Experience in the implementation of complex applications with ABAP objects and another object oriented language
  * Experience in the use of interface technologies (OData, REST, IDOC, ALE)
  * Advance analyzing, troubleshooting and debugging skills
  * University degree in computer science or equivalent
  * Strong English verbal and written skills
  * Solution-orientation and the ability to work independently
  * Strong analytical skills
  * Reliability and accountability on assigned tasks
  * Experience in ABAP development in different SAP modules like FI/CO, SD, MM is a plus
  * Experience with SAP industry solutions like AFS or Retail is a plus
  * Experience with SAP HANA, SAP PI, SAP UWL or other SAP modules is a plus

  
  
**EPAM offers:**  
  
Evolve the design of the solution as the requirements and technical landscape
changes;  
  
Build a technical specialism in one or more development platforms, while at
the same time keeping a broad view of our technologies and languages;  
  
An environment where personal development is encouraged – helping you build a
career shaped by success;  
  
Work-life balance and flexible schedule, team buildings and sport
opportunities;  
  
Modern office in the Infinity Tower business center.  
  
  
  
_If you are interested in this role please send your CV in English._  
  
_All applications will be treated as strictly confidential._  
  
_Only short-listed applicants will be contacted._

direction of the Project/Technical Manager and with customer nominated
representatives. Liaises with Solutions Architect as appropriate.  
  
· Provides technical support and input on the application of technology to a
defined business segment. Provides advice on solution and integration
opportunities to defined segments.  
  
· Provides technical leadership on specific integration activities that are
part of an engagement.  
  
· Provides planning and design support for the development of solution
architectures that will be implemented in a multiple system environment.  
  
· Communicates across client community, and is viewed as adding value.
Demonstrates execution of the HP strategy.  
  
· Contributes to knowledge tools and communities, and ensures project
learning’s are documented and shared. Role models Focuses on single customer.
Solves diverse and complex. May lead a project team.  
  
· Has sufficient depth and breadth of technical knowledge to be individually
responsible for the design and scope of deliverables within a field of
expertise. Has led small team in delivery of a specific deliverable.  
  
· Has mastered at least one technical discipline with strong knowledge in at
least three major technology areas. Possesses advanced level of business,
technical, or functional knowledge.  
  
· Has ability to perform/drive resolution of problems on combinations and
interactions of products. Ability to apply technology and consulting to solve
a client business problem.  
  
· Able to communicate and present complex issues with assurance and
confidence. Demonstrates the use of consulting skills including: questioning,
listening, ideas development, permission and rapport, and influencing.  
  
· Ability to conduct/lead oral status/technical interchange meetings with
clients on small to medium sized engagements.  
  
· Owns and produces customer documentation. Ability to translate technical
details into concise and easy to understand written form. Ability to write
relevant components of a proposal document (e.g. answer specific RFP
questions). Ability to translate verbal requirements from face to face client
meetings into requirements documents, statements of work, and proposals.  
  
· Able to discuss (within own area of expertise) requirements with a customer,
and to challenge and clarify when appropriate. From the requirements, able to
develop a high level design or plan, and then estimate the amount of effort
required to deliver. Able to advise the engagement owner about the risks
associated with this work package.  
  
· Ability to work with a team to provide written responses to technical
proposals and /or reports/documentation for delivery.  
  
  
Qualifications  
  
  
Education and Experience Required:  
  
\- 5+ years of professional experience and a Bachelor of Arts/Science or
equivalent degree in computer science or related area of study; without a
degree, three additional years of relevant professional experience (8+ years
in total).  
  
  
  
Essential Knowledge and Skills Required:  
  
• Relevant experience in Citrix Xenmobile design, troubleshooting, disaster
recovery and administration in an enterprise environment.

description:
|  BORICA-BANKSERVICE AD is a company, specialized in development and
operating of National and European payment systems, National information
systems and other software products, services and technologies for Bulgarian
bank system, as well as, corporate structures, companies and physical persons.  
BORICA-BANKSERVICE AD want to expand one of our project teams and will recruit
a dynamic, highly motivated, full-time, Mid- to Senior-Level .NET WEB
APPLICATION DEVELOPER with 3+ work experience in Sofia.  
  
The qualified candidate will have a solid understanding of Web Application
architecture. The Web Developer will be responsible for building applications
that meet the business requirements, satisfy design aspects, and has reuse
value for development. The ideal candidate will be proficient in MVC, Web
Forms, C#.NET, VB.NET, Entity Framework, LINQ, Razor, Web Services, SQL,
JavaScript, JQuery, XML, HTML, CSS and AJAX.  
  
The Web Developer will be responsible for developing, documenting and
maintaining .Net custom Web Applications.  
  
Responsibilities:  
  
• Designs and develops new features and/or maintains existing ASP.NET Web
Applications  
• Develops code and supporting documentation  
• Works in a team environment to develop, test and deploy software changes
(full lifecycle software development)  
• Works the JIRA backlog of features and bugs  
• Develops well-tested, high performance, scalable Web Applications  
• Stays current on new technologies and best practices  
• Other Web Development duties as required  
  
Core Qualifications:  
  
• Bachelor of Science, in Computer Science or Engineering or equivalent trade-
off in related education  
• 3+ years minimum, 5+ years desirable work experience as an ASP.NET Web
Application Developer  
• Proficiency in MVC, Web Forms, C#.NET, Entity Framework, LINQ, Razor, Web
Services, JavaScript, JQuery, XML, HTML, CSS and AJAX  
• Experience with Microsoft SQL Server, IIS, T-SQL, Stored Procedures and
Database Design desirable  
• Work with Microsoft Visual Studio and SQL Management Studio  
• Exposure to Microsoft Windows Server, and SQL Server admin tasks  
• Experience with Version Control and Bug Tracking tools, preferable
TortoiseSVN/VisualSVN and JIRA  
  
Other Qualifications Desirable:  
  
• Ability and eagerness to learn new languages and business environments
quickly and effectively  
• Solid understanding of object-oriented programming, basic data structure
theory and Computer Science fundamentals  
• Experience with full lifecycle software development  
• Ability to multi-task  
• Strong oral and written communication and listening skills  
• An eye for attention to detail and a software craftsmanship attitude  
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills  
  
Nice to Have:  
  
• Knowledge of LibrariesTools including: TelerikKendo UI, RedGate, Bootstrap,
Newtosoft, AutoMapper, Elmah  
• Hands-on knowledge of development methodologies such as AgileScrum  
• Certification: MCSD, Web Applications  
  
We will offer:  
  
• Challenging work in international business environment  
• Competitive remuneration package and benefits  
• Opportunity for career development and progress  
• Constant professional training and development  
• Unique set of new knowledge, skills and expertise  
  
Interested applicants should send cover letter, CV and recent photo.  
Only short list of selected applicants will be invited to an interview.

description:
|

_** Where Will Your Ambitions Take You?  
  
**_Tek Experts is a global IT services provider with operations in Europe, America, Asia and Africa. We opened our Bulgaria site in 2011 and already employ around 350 people. And we are growing day-by-day. We are at the forefront of business and IT support and development in the region and are committed to developing our people and our operations for the long term. By joining Tek Experts Bulgaria, you can learn with us, grow with us and become part of our journey to greatness._**  
**_**  
****Our Client:** Internationally recognized American company well know on the market in the e-commerce busyness providing quote to cash solutions using SalesForce cloud technology.  
  
_** Tek Experts is looking for a: ****Technical Architect****  
**_  

**Primary Responsibilities Include:**

  * Leading technical requirements gathering sessions and writing technical requirements documents. 
  * Leading technical design sessions and writing technical design documents. 
  * Managing the technical delivery of integrations and custom extensions. 
  * Managing technical scope and client expectation.
  * Responsible for providing hands on expert level assistance to developers for technical issues. 
  * Expert in Force development, Salesforce integration and extension, features, designing solutions, using Force API, APEX, Visualforce and other tools that extend the product.
  * Participate in pre-sales activities as required

**Required Skills/Experience:**

  * Minimum 8 years experience as a team member of successful software project implementations related to SaaS, CRM or ERP and minimum 5 years experience in the capacity of a Technical Architect in a consulting organization.
  * Ability to define and deliver custom Force enterprise applications.
  * Completion of several CRM integration and extension projects in development and lead technical roles.
  * S. in Business, Computer Science, MIS or related field.
  * Proven ability to design and optimize business processes and to integrate business processes across disparate systems.
  * Experience with CRM, ERP
  * Knowledge of Eclipse and or CLion preferred
  * Experience in Enterprise Integration tools, ETL and Web Application Development.
  * Ideally some hands-on experience in APEX, Visualforce.
  * A thorough understanding of XML, SQL, and enterprise application integration.
  * Work experience with a professional consulting organization (e.g., Big 5 consulting) a plus.
  * Travel regularly with average of 20% but may be higher as required by client engagements.
  * Excellent analysis skills and the ability to develop processes and methodologies.
  * Must possess strong communication and interpersonal skills
  * Excellent presentation and communication skills.
  * Ability to work collaboratively within a team environment of cross functional and cross vendor teams, and deliver to aggressive timelines
  * Detail-oriented individual with the ability to rapidly learn and take advantage of new concepts, business models, and technologies
  * Experience with middleware like Informatica, Tibco, Mulesoft, Jitterbit, etc. preferred

If you are interested in this offer, please send your CV in English.  
Only short-listed candidates will be contacted.****  
  
****

description:
|  Description  
  
  
The Global Engineering and Technical Consulting team is responsible for
architecture and engineering and integration of DCS & Cloud solutions
based on the standards or nonstandard portfolio offerings. Often our services
are utilized during the transformation phase to help a client move from
“current state” to “future state”. We enable accounts and delivery teams to
provide DCS and Cloud Services that were contracted with the client.  
  
The Technology Architect provides technical leadership for development of
Future Mode of Operation designs and technical migration plans for DCS &
Cloud:  
  
-End to End responsibility for technical content of deliverables produced by Global Engineering & Technical Consulting (GE&TC) – DCS & Cloud  
-Translate functional requirements to technical requirements  
-Promote standardization and automation during transformation in T&T engagements  
-Ensure developed solutions are aligned with engineering repositories (Playbooks, CMR) and Portfolio websites/repositories (What we sell, EG Portfolio portals).   
-Ensure that existing deliverables/templates are leveraged to satisfy new work request  
-Ensure applicable content standards are met  
-Ensure peer review deliverables are logged in   
-Store engineering related collateral in approved configuration management repository  
-Integrate and collaborate with other organizations/resources (other HP teams, vendors, suppliers, customers) during engineering life cycle  
-Thought Leadership / Technical Point Of Contact for HP tower/project teams.   
-Produces High Level Design and approve Low Level Designs for end to end coherency.  
-Ensure the successful delivery of the required detailed solution designs (LLD) based on client requirements and project schedule.  
-Support Hand-over to production of implemented solutions  
-Support the PMs in defining Work Packages, Deliverables, Engineers Teams, WBS, and also address issues, mitigate risks and cross coordinate engineer teams  
  
  
For Virtual Private Cloud

description:

description:
|  Adcash is a real-time advertising trading platform that delivers maximum
exposure for advertisers and a simple, effective way for publishers to make
money. We’re committed to delivering the best customer experience, by offering
powerful, convenient tools and backing them up with dedicated, multi-lingual
support. We come from all over the world, with 20 nationalities and 15
languages between us, meaning we’re a diverse team, but all with one aim: our
customer’s success.  
  
We need an experienced Software Engineer Manager to join our busy IT team in
Sofia and become part of an exciting and growing enterprise.  
  
In this role you will be responsible for the development of our current
products and software tools as well as future releases, new products and
ongoing improvements. To fill this position you need to have ample experience
and proficiency in all aspects of the software development process.  
While this position may not require an extensive amount of coding, technical
knowledge and a broad understanding of ways to implement solutions in managing
huge amount of data and working with the best online technologies across
applications will be necessary.  
  
So, what will you be doing, day to day? You will...  
  
Manage and supervise the local IT project managers located in Sofia.  
This includes:  
Manage iterative technical execution through product teams, promoting
collaboration, open dialogue and a positive work environment.  
Negotiate with product owners and fellow managers to predict and offset
project risk.  
Define the technical product specs.  
Focus on the professional development of the teams.  
Interact with stakeholders and departments to ensure Software team goals and
priorities align with project vision and strategic direction.  
Define/refine processes, methodologies and tools related to our Software
Factory.  
Strive to standardize and to formalize in the following up and the execution
of projects. You will be the source of documentation, guidance and metrics on
the practice of project management and execution.  
Manage and publish the accuracy and the veracity of the metrics used and
shared with the top management around the roadmap of the company.  
Monitoring and reporting on active projects and portfolios (following up
project until completion), and reporting progress for strategic decisions.  
Provides a synthesis of all the projects (closed, on-going and planned) and
gathers data such as estimation, planning, scheduling, resource allocation.  
  
If you’re interested, we need you to have...  
  
Leadership and enthusiasm for developing a team-focused work environment.  
Desire to work with a tight-knit, multi-disciplinary team.  
Contribute to development of new solutions and expand of existing ones.  
Ability to mentor project managers and other technical staff (validation and
infrastructure engineers).  
A broad understanding of software engineering and Agile methodology.  
Several years experience architecting software products.  
Understanding of Design Patterns, of database architecture, of API and bst.  
Competency in managing big data and oversight of algorithm development.  
Experience leading teams of 10+ engineers.  
Experience with management tools such as Atlassian suite (Confluence, Jira,
...).  
Fluent in English.  
Self-starter.  
Ability to meet tight deadlines.  
  
By joining us, you will become part of our dynamic and ever-growing team. We
offer unlimited opportunities for self-improvement and growth, a competitive
salary, friendly multicultural environment and a modern office in the city
center of Sofia.  
If you have awesome organisational, analytical and problem solving skills,
then we'd love to hear from you!
title: Software Engineering Manager

company: Ай Ес Джи Би Джи ЕООД
description:
|  We are Anakatech, an established, leading lottery scratch cards and slots
games development company that operates globally. We have over 100 motivated
and enthusiastic employees, led by focused and professional management team.  
We bring a fresh winning approach to development and business operations in
the gaming industry by focusing on innovation, process improvement, customer
engagement, technology innovation and talents development.  
  
We are operating in Sofia for over three years and the great success and
business growth lead a recent strategic decision to significantly increase the
Sofia operation and R&D units towards a rapid extensive growth.  
We have recently relocated to renovated office in the center of Sofia and are
ready to embark on a significant growth in manpower.  
  
With the rapid expansion of our Bulgarian office we are looking for a highly
motivated person to join our team as a Senior Front End Developer.  
  
If you are looking for an interesting and challenging job; if you would like
to be part of a team of young and enthusiastic professionals who work in a
friendly and informal environment and enjoy their job; if you would like to
become part of a fascinating world, we have a proposal for you.  
  
  
What would you do?

• Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.  
• Working in a team environment and collaborating to the constant improvement
of team knowledge and effectiveness.

project related issues.  
  
We would like you to have:  
• At least 5+ year of experience with HTML5, JavaScript, SCC3 - Mandatory.  
• Experience with Angular OR React OR Backbone – an advantage.  
• Node JS - an advantage.  
• B.Sc. in computer Science or computer engineering - Mandatory.  
• Fluent English.  
  
What we offer:  
• An Excellent opportunity to grow with us and develop your career.  
• A Dynamic and rapidly growing global company.  
• Great and supporting working environment.  
• Opportunity to join a family of great and friendly talents (like you).  
• Highly competitive salary with bonuses and extra benefits.  
• Social benefits.  
• Increasing annual paid vacation.  
• Long-term career opportunity and job security in a multinational company.  
• Open and transparent communication.  
• Team activities, team buildings, company parties.  
• Brand new offices with play and relaxation zones. Ahh and a fabulous huge
terrace :-)  
  
Don’t waste your time!  
If you're interested, send us your CV in English and join the Anakatech global
family.

description:

manufactures innovative cockpit electronics products and connected car
solutions for most of the world’s major vehicle manufacturers. Visteon is a
